blocks.name: snjust
blocks.content: Soundness justification theorem for ~ df-sn . (Contributed by Rodolfo Medina, 28-Apr-2010.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 29-Jun-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm snjust(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  |- wceq(cab(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), cab(s1, wceq(cv(s1), c0)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
} = {
  eqtri(cab(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c0)), cab(s1, wceq(cv(s1), c0)), cab(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))
  cbvabv(s0, hs0, wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  eqeq1(cv(s0), cv(hs0), c0)
  cbvabv(hs0, s1, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(s1), c0))
  eqeq1(cv(hs0), cv(s1), c0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cv(s1), c0))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm snjust(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0) {
  ⊢ { s0 | s0 = c0 } = { s1 | s1 = c0 }
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
} = {
  eqtri({ s0 | s0 = c0 }, { s1 | s1 = c0 }, { hs0 | hs0 = c0 })
  cbvabv(s0, hs0, s0 = c0, hs0 = c0)
  eqeq1(s0, hs0, c0)
  cbvabv(hs0, s1, hs0 = c0, s1 = c0)
  eqeq1(hs0, s1, c0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(s0 = c0)
  diff.hs0.w(s1 = c0)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, hs0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
}

df-sn
blocks.content: Define the singleton of a class. Definition 7.1 of [Quine] p. 48. For convenience, it is well-defined for proper classes, i.e., those that are not elements of ` _V ` , see ~ snprc . For an alternate definition see ~ dfsn2 . (Contributed by NM, 21-Jun-1993.)

blocks.name: cpr
blocks.content: Extend class notation to include unordered pair.
blocks.origin: prop class cpr(class c0, class c1) { { c0, c1 } }

blocks.name: diff.cpr.s
diff.cpr.c
diff.cpr.w
df-pr
blocks.content: Define unordered pair of classes. Definition 7.1 of [Quine] p. 48. For example, ` A e. { 1 , -u 1 } -> ( A ^ 2 ) = 1 ` ( ~ ex-pr ). They are unordered, so ` { A , B } = { B , A } ` as proven by ~ prcom . For a more traditional definition, but requiring a dummy variable, see ~ dfpr2 . ` { A , A } ` is also an unordered pair, but also a singleton because of ` { A } = { A , A } ` (see ~ dfsn2 ). Therefore, ` { A , B } ` is called a _proper (unordered) pair_ iff ` A =/= B ` and ` A ` and ` B ` are sets. (Contributed by NM, 21-Jun-1993.)

blocks.name: cop

blocks.name: diff.cop.s
diff.cop.c
diff.cop.w
df-op
blocks.content: Definition of an ordered pair, equivalent to Kuratowski's definition ` { { A } , { A , B } } ` when the arguments are sets. Since the behavior of Kuratowski definition is not very useful for proper classes, we define it to be empty in this case (see ~ opprc1 , ~ opprc2 , and ~ 0nelop ). For Kuratowski's actual definition when the arguments are sets, see ~ dfop . For the justifying theorem (for sets) see ~ opth . See ~ dfopif for an equivalent formulation using the ` if ` operation. Definition 9.1 of [Quine] p. 58 defines an ordered pair unconditionally as ` <. A , B >. = { { A } , { A , B } } ` , which has different behavior from our ~ df-op when the arguments are proper classes. Ordinarily this difference is not important, since neither definition is meaningful in that case. Our ~ df-op was chosen because it often makes proofs shorter by eliminating unnecessary sethood hypotheses. There are other ways to define ordered pairs. The basic requirement is that two ordered pairs are equal iff their respective members are equal. In 1914 Norbert Wiener gave the first successful definition ` <. A , B >. ` _2 ` = { { { A } , (/) } , { { B } } } ` , justified by ~ opthwiener . This was simplified by Kazimierz Kuratowski in 1921 to our present definition. An even simpler definition ` <. A , B >. ` _3 ` = { A , { A , B } } ` is justified by ~ opthreg , but it requires the Axiom of Regularity for its justification and is not commonly used. A definition that also works for proper classes is ` <. A , B >. ` _4 ` = ( ( A X. { (/) } ) u. ( B X. { { (/) } } ) ) ` , justified by ~ opthprc . Nearly at the same time as Norbert Wiener, Felix Hausdorff proposed the following definition in "Grundzüge der Mengenlehre" ("Basics of Set Theory"), p. 32, in 1914: ` <. A , B >. ` _5 ` = { { A , O } , { B , T } } ` . Hausdorff used ` 1 ` and ` 2 ` instead of ` O ` and ` T ` , but actually any two different fixed sets will do (e.g., ` O = (/) ` and ` T = { (/) } ` , see ~ 0nep0 ). Furthermore, Hausdorff demanded that ` O ` and ` T ` are both different from ` A ` as well as ` B ` , which is actually not necessary (at least not in full extent), see ~ opthhausdorff0 and ~ opthhausdorff . If we restrict our sets to nonnegative integers, an ordered pair definition that involves only elementary arithmetic is provided by ~ nn0opthi . An ordered pair of real numbers can also be represented by a complex number as shown by ~ cru . Kuratowski's ordered pair definition is standard for ZFC set theory, but it is very inconvenient to use in New Foundations theory because it is not type-level; a common alternate definition in New Foundations is the definition from [Rosser] p. 281. Since there are other ways to define ordered pairs, we discourage direct use of this definition so that most theorems won't depend on this particular construction; theorems will instead rely on ~ dfopif . (Contributed by NM, 28-May-1995.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2015.) (Avoid depending on this detail.)

blocks.name: dfpr2
blocks.content: Alternate definition of unordered pair. Definition 5.1 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 15. (Contributed by NM, 24-Apr-1994.)
blocks.origin:
thm dfpr2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(cpr(c0, c1), cab(s0, wo(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s0), c1))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  eqtri(cpr(c0, c1), cab(s0, wo(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s0), c1))), cun(csn(c0), csn(c1)))
  df-pr(c0, c1)
  abbi2i(s0, cun(csn(c0), csn(c1)), wo(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s0), c1)))
  bitri(wcel(cv(s0), cun(csn(c0), csn(c1))), wo(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s0), c1)), wo(wcel(cv(s0), csn(c0)), wcel(cv(s0), csn(c1))))
  elun(cv(s0), csn(c0), csn(c1))
  orbi12i(wcel(cv(s0), csn(c0)), wcel(cv(s0), csn(c1)), wceq(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s0), c1))
  velsn(s0, c0)
  velsn(s0, c1)
  diff.cun.s(s0, csn(c0), csn(c1))
  diff.csn.s(s0, c0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm dfpr2(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ { c0, c1 } = { s0 |(s0 = c0 ∨ s0 = c1)}
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  eqtri({ c0, c1 }, { s0 |(s0 = c0 ∨ s0 = c1)}, ({ c0 } ⋃ { c1 }))
  df-pr(c0, c1)
  abbi2i(s0, ({ c0 } ⋃ { c1 }), (s0 = c0 ∨ s0 = c1))
  bitri(s0 ∈({ c0 } ⋃ { c1 }), (s0 = c0 ∨ s0 = c1), (s0 ∈ { c0 } ∨ s0 ∈ { c1 }))
  elun(s0, { c0 }, { c1 })
  orbi12i(s0 ∈ { c0 }, s0 ∈ { c1 }, s0 = c0, s0 = c1)
  velsn(s0, c0)
  velsn(s0, c1)
  diff.cun.s(s0, { c0 }, { c1 })
  diff.csn.s(s0, c0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c1)
}

blocks.name: elprg
blocks.content: A member of an unordered pair of classes is one or the other of them. Exercise 1 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 15, generalized. (Contributed by NM, 13-Sep-1995.)

blocks.name: elpri
blocks.content: If a class is an element of a pair, then it is one of the two paired elements. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 1-Apr-2011.)

blocks.name: elpr
blocks.content: A member of an unordered pair of classes is one or the other of them. Exercise 1 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 15. (Contributed by NM, 13-Sep-1995.)

blocks.name: elpr2
blocks.content: A member of an unordered pair of classes is one or the other of them. Exercise 1 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 15. (Contributed by NM, 14-Oct-2005.) (Proof shortened by JJ, 23-Jul-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm elpr2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wcel(c0, cpr(c1, c2)), wo(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c0, c2)))
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
  -| wcel(c2, universe)
} = {
  pm5.21nii(wcel(c0, cpr(c1, c2)), wo(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c0, c2)), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, cpr(c1, c2))
  jaoi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c0, c2), wcel(c0, universe))
  mpbiri(wceq(c0, c1), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))
  eleq1(c0, c1, universe)
  mpbiri(wceq(c0, c2), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c2, universe))
  eleq1(c0, c2, universe)
  elprg(c0, universe, c1, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elpr2(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ { c1, c2 } ↔(c0 = c1 ∨ c0 = c2))
  ⊣ c1 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ c2 ∈ 𝕌
} = {
  pm5.21nii(c0 ∈ { c1, c2 }, (c0 = c1 ∨ c0 = c2), c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  elex(c0, { c1, c2 })
  jaoi(c0 = c1, c0 = c2, c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  mpbiri(c0 = c1, c0 ∈ 𝕌, c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  eleq1(c0, c1, universe)
  mpbiri(c0 = c2, c0 ∈ 𝕌, c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  eleq1(c0, c2, universe)
  elprg(c0, universe, c1, c2)
}

blocks.origin:
thm rexdifpr(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wb(wrex(s0, cdif(c0, cpr(c1, c2)), w0), wrex(s0, c0, w3a(wne(cv(s0), c1), wne(cv(s0), c2), w0)))
} = {
  rexbii2(s0, cdif(c0, cpr(c1, c2)), c0, w0, w3a(wne(cv(s0), c1), wne(cv(s0), c2), w0))
  bitri(wa(wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, cpr(c1, c2))), w0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w3a(wne(cv(s0), c1), wne(cv(s0), c2), w0)), wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wne(cv(s0), c1), wne(cv(s0), c2))), w0))
  anbi1i(wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, cpr(c1, c2))), w0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wne(cv(s0), c1), wne(cv(s0), c2))))
  bitri(wcel(cv(s0), cdif(c0, cpr(c1, c2))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wne(cv(s0), c1), wne(cv(s0), c2))), w3a(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wne(cv(s0), c1), wne(cv(s0), c2)))
  eldifpr(cv(s0), c0, c1, c2)
  3anass(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wne(cv(s0), c1), wne(cv(s0), c2))
  bitri(wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wne(cv(s0), c1), wne(cv(s0), c2))), w0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w3a(wne(cv(s0), c1), wne(cv(s0), c2), w0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wa(wne(cv(s0), c1), wne(cv(s0), c2)), w0)))
  anass(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wne(cv(s0), c1), wne(cv(s0), c2)), w0)
  anbi2i(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wa(wa(wne(cv(s0), c1), wne(cv(s0), c2)), w0), w3a(wne(cv(s0), c1), wne(cv(s0), c2), w0))
  bicomi(wa(wa(wne(cv(s0), c1), wne(cv(s0), c2)), w0), w3a(wne(cv(s0), c1), wne(cv(s0), c2), w0))
  df-3an(wne(cv(s0), c1), wne(cv(s0), c2), w0)
}

blocks.origin:
thm rabsssn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wb(wss(crab(s0, c0, w0), csn(c1)), wral(s0, c0, wi(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  3bitri(wss(crab(s0, c0, w0), csn(c1)), wral(s0, c0, wi(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1))), wss(cab(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)), cab(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c1))), wal(s0, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0), wceq(cv(s0), c1))))
  sseq12i(crab(s0, c0, w0), csn(c1), cab(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)), cab(s0, wceq(cv(s0), c1)))
  df-rab(s0, c0, w0)
  df-sn(s0, c1)
  ss2ab(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0), wceq(cv(s0), c1))
  bitr4i(wal(s0, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0), wceq(cv(s0), c1))), wral(s0, c0, wi(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1))), wal(s0, wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1)))))
  albii(s0, wi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0), wceq(cv(s0), c1)), wi(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wi(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1))))
  impexp(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1))
  df-ral(s0, c0, wi(w0, wceq(cv(s0), c1)))
}

  reu8nf(s0, hs0, hs1, csn(c0), w0, wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), w0), wsbc(s0, cv(hs1), w0))
  nfsbc1v(s0, cv(hs1), w0)
  sbceq1a(s0, cv(hs1), w0)
  dfsbcq(s0, cv(hs1), cv(hs0), w0)
  bitrd(wcel(c0, c1), wrex(s0, csn(c0), wa(w0, wral(hs0, csn(c0), wi(wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), w0), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))))), w1, wa(w1, wral(hs0, csn(c0), wi(wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), w0), wceq(c0, cv(hs0))))))
  rexsngf(s0, c0, c1, wa(w0, wral(hs0, csn(c0), wi(wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), w0), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))), wa(w1, wral(hs0, csn(c0), wi(wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), w0), wceq(c0, cv(hs0))))))
  nfan(s0, w1, wral(hs0, csn(c0), wi(wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), w0), wceq(c0, cv(hs0)))))
  nfral(s0, hs0, csn(c0), wi(wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), w0), wceq(c0, cv(hs0))))
  nfcv(s0, csn(c0))
  nfim(s0, wsbc(s0, cv(hs0), w0), wceq(c0, cv(hs0)))

thm 2ralsng(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wral(s0, csn(c0), wral(s1, csn(c2), w0)), w1))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s1), c2), wb(w2, w1))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
  -| diffsw(s1, w1)
} = {
  sylan9bb(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wral(s0, csn(c0), wral(s1, csn(c2), w0)), w1, wral(s1, csn(c2), w2))

thm 2ralsng(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)→(∀(s0 ∈ { c0 }, ∀(s1 ∈ { c2 }, w0))↔ w1))
  ⊣ (s0 = c0 →(w0 ↔ w2))
  ⊣ (s1 = c2 →(w2 ↔ w1))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w2)
  ⊣ d(s1, w1)
} = {
  sylan9bb(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3, ∀(s0 ∈ { c0 }, ∀(s1 ∈ { c2 }, w0)), w1, ∀(s1 ∈ { c2 }, w2))
  ralsng(s0, c0, c1, ∀(s1 ∈ { c2 }, w0), ∀(s1 ∈ { c2 }, w2))
  ralbidv(s1, { c2 }, s0 = c0, w0, w2)
  ralsng(s1, c2, c3, w2, w1)
  diff.wral.s(s0, s1, { c2 }, w2)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c2)
  diff.wceq.s(s1, s0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

  rexlimdv(hs0, c0, wcel(c0, cpw(cun(c1, csn(c2)))), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(c2, c0))
  pm2.43b(wcel(c0, cpw(cun(c1, csn(c2)))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wi(wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(c2, c0)))
  com4r(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(c0, cpw(cun(c1, csn(c2)))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wcel(c2, c0))
  expd(wcel(c0, cpw(cun(c1, csn(c2)))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(c2, c0)))
  syl6(wcel(c0, cpw(cun(c1, csn(c2)))), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(c2, c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  3syl(wcel(c0, cpw(cun(c1, csn(c2)))), wi(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wss(c0, cun(c1, csn(c2))), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cun(c1, csn(c2)))))
  elpwi(c0, cun(c1, csn(c2)))
  ssel(c0, cun(c1, csn(c2)), cv(hs0))
  impd(wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cun(c1, csn(c2)))), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  imim2i(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), cun(c1, csn(c2))), wi(wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))
  sylbi(wcel(cv(hs0), cun(c1, csn(c2))), wi(wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c2))))
  elun(cv(hs0), c1, csn(c2))
  ord(wo(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  orim2i(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  elsni(cv(hs0), c2)
  biimpd(wceq(cv(hs0), c2), wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(c2, c0))
  eleq1(cv(hs0), c2, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, cpw(cun(c1, csn(c2)))))
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c2, c0))
}

blocks.name: eqoreldif
blocks.content: An element of a set is either equal to another element of the set or a member of the difference of the set and the singleton containing the other element. (Contributed by AV, 25-Aug-2020.) (Proof shortened by JJ, 23-Jul-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm eqoreldif(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c2, c1), wo(wceq(c2, c0), wcel(c2, cdif(c1, csn(c0))))))
} = {
  impbid2(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wo(wceq(c2, c0), wcel(c2, cdif(c1, csn(c0)))))
  orrd(wcel(c2, c1), wceq(c2, c0), wcel(c2, cdif(c1, csn(c0))))
  ex(wcel(c2, c1), wn(wceq(c2, c0)), wcel(c2, cdif(c1, csn(c0))))
  eldifd(c2, c1, csn(c0), wa(wcel(c2, c1), wn(wceq(c2, c0))))
  simpl(wcel(c2, c1), wn(wceq(c2, c0)))
  adantl(wcel(c2, c1), wn(wceq(c2, c0)), wn(wcel(c2, csn(c0))))
  con3i(wceq(c2, c0), wcel(c2, csn(c0)))
  elsni(c2, c0)
  jaod(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c0), wcel(c2, cdif(c1, csn(c0))), wcel(c2, c1))
  eleq1a(c0, c1, c2)
  a1i(wcel(c0, c1), wi(wcel(c2, cdif(c1, csn(c0))), wcel(c2, c1)))
  eldifi(c2, c1, csn(c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm eqoreldif(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →(c2 ∈ c1 ↔(c2 = c0 ∨ c2 ∈(c1 \ { c0 }))))
} = {
  impbid2(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c1, (c2 = c0 ∨ c2 ∈(c1 \ { c0 })))
  orrd(c2 ∈ c1, c2 = c0, c2 ∈(c1 \ { c0 }))
  ex(c2 ∈ c1, ¬ c2 = c0, c2 ∈(c1 \ { c0 }))
  eldifd(c2, c1, { c0 }, (c2 ∈ c1 ∧ ¬ c2 = c0))
  simpl(c2 ∈ c1, ¬ c2 = c0)
  adantl(c2 ∈ c1, ¬ c2 = c0, ¬ c2 ∈ { c0 })
  con3i(c2 = c0, c2 ∈ { c0 })
  elsni(c2, c0)
  jaod(c0 ∈ c1, c2 = c0, c2 ∈(c1 \ { c0 }), c2 ∈ c1)
  eleq1a(c0, c1, c2)
  a1i(c0 ∈ c1, (c2 ∈(c1 \ { c0 })→ c2 ∈ c1))
  eldifi(c2, c1, { c0 })
}

} = {
  nfcxfr(s0, cpr(c0, c1), cab(hs0, wo(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))))
  dfpr2(hs0, c0, c1)
  nfab(s0, hs0, wo(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1)))
  nfor(s0, wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  nfeq2(s0, cv(hs0), c0)
  nfeq2(s0, cv(hs0), c1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)

blocks.pretty:
thm nfpr(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ F/(s0, { c0, c1 })
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c1)
} = {
  nfcxfr(s0, { c0, c1 }, { hs0 |(hs0 = c0 ∨ hs0 = c1)})
  dfpr2(hs0, c0, c1)
  nfab(s0, hs0, (hs0 = c0 ∨ hs0 = c1))
  nfor(s0, hs0 = c0, hs0 = c1)

blocks.name: ralprgf
blocks.content: Convert a restricted universal quantification over a pair to a conjunction, using bound-variable hypotheses instead of distinct variable conditions. (Contributed by NM, 17-Sep-2011.) (Revised by AV, 8-Apr-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm ralprgf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wral(s0, cpr(c0, c2), w0), wa(w1, w2)))
  -| wnf(s0, w1)
  -| wnf(s0, w2)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w1))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c2), wb(w0, w2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  syl5bb(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wral(s0, cpr(c0, c2), w0), wa(w1, w2), wa(wral(s0, csn(c0), w0), wral(s0, csn(c2), w0)))
  bitri(wral(s0, cpr(c0, c2), w0), wa(wral(s0, csn(c0), w0), wral(s0, csn(c2), w0)), wral(s0, cun(csn(c0), csn(c2)), w0))
  raleqi(s0, cpr(c0, c2), cun(csn(c0), csn(c2)), w0)
  df-pr(c0, c2)
  ralunb(s0, csn(c0), csn(c2), w0)
  bi2anan9(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wral(s0, csn(c0), w0), wral(s0, csn(c2), w0), w1, w2)
  ralsngf(s0, c0, c1, w0, w1)
  ralsngf(s0, c2, c3, w0, w2)
  diff.cpr.s(s0, c0, c2)
  diff.cun.s(s0, csn(c0), csn(c2))
  diff.csn.s(s0, c0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ralprgf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)→(∀(s0 ∈ { c0, c2 }, w0)↔(w1 ∧ w2)))
  ⊣ F/(s0, w1)
  ⊣ F/(s0, w2)
  ⊣ (s0 = c0 →(w0 ↔ w1))
  ⊣ (s0 = c2 →(w0 ↔ w2))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  syl5bb((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), ∀(s0 ∈ { c0, c2 }, w0), (w1 ∧ w2), (∀(s0 ∈ { c0 }, w0)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ { c2 }, w0)))
  bitri(∀(s0 ∈ { c0, c2 }, w0), (∀(s0 ∈ { c0 }, w0)∧ ∀(s0 ∈ { c2 }, w0)), ∀(s0 ∈({ c0 } ⋃ { c2 }), w0))
  raleqi(s0, { c0, c2 }, ({ c0 } ⋃ { c2 }), w0)
  df-pr(c0, c2)
  ralunb(s0, { c0 }, { c2 }, w0)
  bi2anan9(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3, ∀(s0 ∈ { c0 }, w0), ∀(s0 ∈ { c2 }, w0), w1, w2)
  ralsngf(s0, c0, c1, w0, w1)
  ralsngf(s0, c2, c3, w0, w2)
  diff.cpr.s(s0, c0, c2)
  diff.cun.s(s0, { c0 }, { c2 })
  diff.csn.s(s0, c0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c2)
}

  sylan9bb(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wo(wrex(s0, csn(c0), w0), wrex(s0, csn(c2), w0)), wo(w1, w2), wo(w1, wrex(s0, csn(c2), w0)))
  orbi1d(wcel(c0, c1), wrex(s0, csn(c0), w0), wrex(s0, csn(c2), w0), w1)
  rexsngf(s0, c0, c1, w0, w1)
  orbi2d(wcel(c2, c3), w1, wrex(s0, csn(c2), w0), w2)

blocks.name: raltpg
blocks.content: Convert a restricted universal quantification over a triple to a conjunction. (Contributed by NM, 17-Sep-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm raltpg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wb(wral(s0, ctp(c0, c2, c4), w0), w3a(w1, w2, w3)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w1))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c2), wb(w0, w2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c4), wb(w0, w3))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w3)
} = {
  3bitr4g(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wral(s0, ctp(c0, c2, c4), w0), w3a(w1, w2, w3), wa(wral(s0, cpr(c0, c2), w0), wral(s0, csn(c4), w0)), wa(wa(w1, w2), w3))
  3impa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5), wb(wa(wral(s0, cpr(c0, c2), w0), wral(s0, csn(c4), w0)), wa(wa(w1, w2), w3)))
  bi2anan9(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(c4, c5), wral(s0, cpr(c0, c2), w0), wral(s0, csn(c4), w0), wa(w1, w2), w3)
  ralprg(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0, w1, w2)
  ralsng(s0, c4, c5, w0, w3)
  bitri(wral(s0, ctp(c0, c2, c4), w0), wa(wral(s0, cpr(c0, c2), w0), wral(s0, csn(c4), w0)), wral(s0, cun(cpr(c0, c2), csn(c4)), w0))
  raleqi(s0, ctp(c0, c2, c4), cun(cpr(c0, c2), csn(c4)), w0)
  df-tp(c0, c2, c4)
  ralunb(s0, cpr(c0, c2), csn(c4), w0)
  df-3an(w1, w2, w3)
  diff.ctp.s(s0, c0, c2, c4)
  diff.cun.s(s0, cpr(c0, c2), csn(c4))
  diff.cpr.s(s0, c0, c2)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c4)
}

blocks.name: rextpg
blocks.content: Convert a restricted existential quantification over a triple to a disjunction. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 23-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm rextpg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wb(wrex(s0, ctp(c0, c2, c4), w0), w3o(w1, w2, w3)))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w1))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c2), wb(w0, w2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c4), wb(w0, w3))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w3)
} = {
  3bitr4g(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wrex(s0, ctp(c0, c2, c4), w0), w3o(w1, w2, w3), wo(wrex(s0, cpr(c0, c2), w0), wrex(s0, csn(c4), w0)), wo(wo(w1, w2), w3))
  3impa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5), wb(wo(wrex(s0, cpr(c0, c2), w0), wrex(s0, csn(c4), w0)), wo(wo(w1, w2), w3)))
  sylan9bb(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(c4, c5), wo(wrex(s0, cpr(c0, c2), w0), wrex(s0, csn(c4), w0)), wo(wo(w1, w2), w3), wo(wo(w1, w2), wrex(s0, csn(c4), w0)))
  orbi1d(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wrex(s0, cpr(c0, c2), w0), wrex(s0, csn(c4), w0), wo(w1, w2))
  rexprg(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0, w1, w2)
  orbi2d(wcel(c4, c5), wo(w1, w2), wrex(s0, csn(c4), w0), w3)
  rexsng(s0, c4, c5, w0, w3)
  bitri(wrex(s0, ctp(c0, c2, c4), w0), wo(wrex(s0, cpr(c0, c2), w0), wrex(s0, csn(c4), w0)), wrex(s0, cun(cpr(c0, c2), csn(c4)), w0))
  rexeqi(s0, ctp(c0, c2, c4), cun(cpr(c0, c2), csn(c4)), w0)
  df-tp(c0, c2, c4)

  df-3or(w1, w2, w3)
  diff.ctp.s(s0, c0, c2, c4)
  diff.cun.s(s0, cpr(c0, c2), csn(c4))

blocks.name: ralpr
blocks.content: Convert a restricted universal quantification over a pair to a conjunction. (Contributed by NM, 3-Jun-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm ralpr(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wb(wral(s0, cpr(c0, c1), w0), wa(w1, w2))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w1))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wb(w0, w2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
} = {
  mp2an(wb(wral(s0, cpr(c0, c1), w0), wa(w1, w2)), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))
  ralprg(s0, c0, universe, c1, universe, w0, w1, w2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm ralpr(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  ⊢ (∀(s0 ∈ { c0, c1 }, w0)↔(w1 ∧ w2))
  ⊣ c0 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ c1 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ (s0 = c0 →(w0 ↔ w1))
  ⊣ (s0 = c1 →(w0 ↔ w2))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w2)
} = {
  mp2an((∀(s0 ∈ { c0, c1 }, w0)↔(w1 ∧ w2)), c0 ∈ 𝕌, c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  ralprg(s0, c0, universe, c1, universe, w0, w1, w2)
}

blocks.name: rexpr
blocks.content: Convert a restricted existential quantification over a pair to a disjunction. (Contributed by NM, 3-Jun-2007.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm rexpr(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wb(wrex(s0, cpr(c0, c1), w0), wo(w1, w2))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w1))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wb(w0, w2))

  -| diffsw(s0, w2)

  rexprg(s0, c0, universe, c1, universe, w0, w1, w2)
}

thm rexpr(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {

} = {

  rexprg(s0, c0, universe, c1, universe, w0, w1, w2)
}

blocks.name: reuprg
blocks.content: Convert a restricted existential uniqueness over a pair to a disjunction and an implication . (Contributed by AV, 2-Apr-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm reuprg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wreu(s0, cpr(c0, c2), w0), wa(wo(w1, w2), wi(wa(w2, w1), wceq(c0, c2)))))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w1))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c2), wb(w0, w2))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
} = {
  syl6bb(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wreu(s0, cpr(c0, c2), w0), wa(wo(w1, w2), wi(wa(w2, w1), wceq(c0, c2))), wo(wa(w1, wi(w2, wceq(c0, c2))), wa(w2, wi(w1, wceq(c0, c2)))))
  reuprg0(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0, w1, w2)
  bitri(wo(wa(w1, wi(w2, wceq(c0, c2))), wa(w2, wi(w1, wceq(c0, c2)))), wa(wo(w1, w2), wi(wa(w2, w1), wceq(c0, c2))), wa(wa(wo(w1, w2), wo(w1, wi(w1, wceq(c0, c2)))), wa(wo(wi(w2, wceq(c0, c2)), w2), wo(wi(w2, wceq(c0, c2)), wi(w1, wceq(c0, c2))))))
  orddi(w1, wi(w2, wceq(c0, c2)), w2, wi(w1, wceq(c0, c2)))
  anbi12i(wa(wo(w1, w2), wo(w1, wi(w1, wceq(c0, c2)))), wa(wo(wi(w2, wceq(c0, c2)), w2), wo(wi(w2, wceq(c0, c2)), wi(w1, wceq(c0, c2)))), wo(w1, w2), wi(wa(w2, w1), wceq(c0, c2)))
  bicomi(wa(wo(w1, w2), wo(w1, wi(w1, wceq(c0, c2)))), wo(w1, w2))
  biantru(wo(w1, w2), wo(w1, wi(w1, wceq(c0, c2))))
  curryax(w1, wceq(c0, c2))
  bitri(wa(wo(wi(w2, wceq(c0, c2)), w2), wo(wi(w2, wceq(c0, c2)), wi(w1, wceq(c0, c2)))), wi(wa(w2, w1), wceq(c0, c2)), wo(wi(w2, wceq(c0, c2)), wi(w1, wceq(c0, c2))))
  bicomi(wa(wo(wi(w2, wceq(c0, c2)), w2), wo(wi(w2, wceq(c0, c2)), wi(w1, wceq(c0, c2)))), wo(wi(w2, wceq(c0, c2)), wi(w1, wceq(c0, c2))))
  biantrur(wo(wi(w2, wceq(c0, c2)), wi(w1, wceq(c0, c2))), wo(wi(w2, wceq(c0, c2)), w2))
  mpbir(wo(wi(w2, wceq(c0, c2)), w2), wo(w2, wi(w2, wceq(c0, c2))))
  curryax(w2, wceq(c0, c2))
  orcom(wi(w2, wceq(c0, c2)), w2)
  pm4.79(w2, wceq(c0, c2), w1)
}

blocks.name: reurexprg
blocks.content: Convert a restricted existential uniqueness over a pair to a restricted existential quantification and an implication . (Contributed by AV, 3-Apr-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm reurexprg(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wb(wreu(s0, cpr(c0, c2), w0), wa(wrex(s0, cpr(c0, c2), w0), wi(wa(w1, w2), wceq(c0, c2)))))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c2), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
} = {
  bitrd(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wreu(s0, cpr(c0, c2), w0), wa(wrex(s0, cpr(c0, c2), w0), wi(wa(w1, w2), wceq(c0, c2))), wa(wo(w2, w1), wi(wa(w1, w2), wceq(c0, c2))))
  reuprg(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0, w2, w1)
  anbi1d(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wo(w2, w1), wi(wa(w1, w2), wceq(c0, c2)), wrex(s0, cpr(c0, c2), w0))
  bicomd(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wo(w2, w1), wrex(s0, cpr(c0, c2), w0))
  rexprg(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, w0, w2, w1)
}

blocks.name: raltp
blocks.content: Convert a quantification over a triple to a conjunction. (Contributed by NM, 13-Sep-2011.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 23-Apr-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm raltp(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3) {
  |- wb(wral(s0, ctp(c0, c1, c2), w0), w3a(w1, w2, w3))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
  -| wcel(c2, universe)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w1))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wb(w0, w2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c2), wb(w0, w3))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w3)
} = {
  mp3an(wb(wral(s0, ctp(c0, c1, c2), w0), w3a(w1, w2, w3)), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c2, universe))
  raltpg(s0, c0, universe, c1, universe, c2, universe, w0, w1, w2, w3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm raltp(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3) {
  ⊢ (∀(s0 ∈ { c0, c1, c2 }, w0)↔(w1 ∧ w2 ∧ w3))
  ⊣ c0 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ c1 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ c2 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ (s0 = c0 →(w0 ↔ w1))
  ⊣ (s0 = c1 →(w0 ↔ w2))
  ⊣ (s0 = c2 →(w0 ↔ w3))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w3)
} = {
  mp3an((∀(s0 ∈ { c0, c1, c2 }, w0)↔(w1 ∧ w2 ∧ w3)), c0 ∈ 𝕌, c1 ∈ 𝕌, c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  raltpg(s0, c0, universe, c1, universe, c2, universe, w0, w1, w2, w3)
}

blocks.name: rextp

blocks.origin:
thm rextp(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3) {
  |- wb(wrex(s0, ctp(c0, c1, c2), w0), w3o(w1, w2, w3))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
  -| wcel(c2, universe)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w1))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wb(w0, w2))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c2), wb(w0, w3))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w2)
  -| diffsw(s0, w3)
} = {
  mp3an(wb(wrex(s0, ctp(c0, c1, c2), w0), w3o(w1, w2, w3)), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c2, universe))
  rextpg(s0, c0, universe, c1, universe, c2, universe, w0, w1, w2, w3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rextp(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0, wff w1, wff w2, wff w3) {
  ⊢ (∃(s0 ∈ { c0, c1, c2 }, w0)↔(w1 ∨ w2 ∨ w3))
  ⊣ c0 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ c1 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ c2 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ (s0 = c0 →(w0 ↔ w1))
  ⊣ (s0 = c1 →(w0 ↔ w2))
  ⊣ (s0 = c2 →(w0 ↔ w3))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w2)
  ⊣ d(s0, w3)
} = {
  mp3an((∃(s0 ∈ { c0, c1, c2 }, w0)↔(w1 ∨ w2 ∨ w3)), c0 ∈ 𝕌, c1 ∈ 𝕌, c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  rextpg(s0, c0, universe, c1, universe, c2, universe, w0, w1, w2, w3)
}

blocks.name: nfsn
blocks.content: Bound-variable hypothesis builder for singletons. (Contributed by NM, 14-Nov-1995.)

blocks.name: csbsng
blocks.content: Distribute proper substitution through the singleton of a class. ~ csbsng is derived from the virtual deduction proof ~ csbsngVD . (Contributed by Alan Sare, 10-Nov-2012.)
blocks.origin:
thm csbsng(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(csb(s0, c0, csn(c2)), csn(csb(s0, c0, c2))))
} = {
  3eqtr4g(csb(s0, c0, csn(c2)), csn(csb(s0, c0, c2)), csb(s0, c0, cab(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), cab(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), csb(s0, c0, c2))), wcel(c0, c1))
  syl5eq(csb(s0, c0, cab(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), cab(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), csb(s0, c0, c2))), cab(hs0, wsbc(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2))), wcel(c0, c1))
  csbab(s0, hs0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2))
  abbidv(hs0, wcel(c0, c1), wsbc(s0, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), csb(s0, c0, c2)))
  sbceq2g(s0, c0, c1, cv(hs0), c2)
  csbeq2i(s0, c0, csn(c2), cab(hs0, wceq(cv(hs0), c2)))
  df-sn(hs0, c2)
  df-sn(hs0, csb(s0, c0, c2))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wcel(c0, c1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(csb(s0, c0, c2))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm csbsng(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →[c0 / s0]{ c2 } = {[c0 / s0]c2 })
} = {
  3eqtr4g([c0 / s0]{ c2 }, {[c0 / s0]c2 }, [c0 / s0]{ hs0 | hs0 = c2 }, { hs0 | hs0 =[c0 / s0]c2 }, c0 ∈ c1)
  syl5eq([c0 / s0]{ hs0 | hs0 = c2 }, { hs0 | hs0 =[c0 / s0]c2 }, { hs0 |[c0 / s0]hs0 = c2 }, c0 ∈ c1)
  csbab(s0, hs0, c0, hs0 = c2)
  abbidv(hs0, c0 ∈ c1, [c0 / s0]hs0 = c2, hs0 =[c0 / s0]c2)
  sbceq2g(s0, c0, c1, hs0, c2)
  csbeq2i(s0, c0, { c2 }, { hs0 | hs0 = c2 })
  df-sn(hs0, c2)
  df-sn(hs0, [c0 / s0]c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(c0 ∈ c1)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c([c0 / s0]c2)
}

blocks.name: csbprg
blocks.content: Distribute proper substitution through a pair of classes. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 4-Sep-2018.)

blocks.name: elinsn
blocks.content: If the intersection of two classes is a (proper) singleton, then the singleton element is a member of both classes. (Contributed by AV, 30-Dec-2021.)

blocks.name: disjsn
blocks.content: Intersection with the singleton of a non-member is disjoint. (Contributed by NM, 22-May-1998.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 29-Jun-2011.) (Proof shortened by Wolf Lammen, 30-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm disjsn(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wb(wceq(cin(c0, csn(c1)), emptycls), wn(wcel(c1, c0)))
} = {
  3bitri(wceq(cin(c0, csn(c1)), emptycls), wn(wcel(c1, c0)), wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c1))))), wal(hs0, wn(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))))
  disj1(hs0, c0, csn(c1))
  albii(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c1)))), wn(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))))
  3bitri(wi(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c1)))), wn(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))), wi(wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c1)), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c0))), wi(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c0))))
  con2b(wcel(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c1)))
  imbi1i(wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c1)), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  velsn(hs0, c1)
  imnan(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  xchbinxr(wal(hs0, wn(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))), wcel(c1, c0), wex(hs0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c0))))
  alnex(hs0, wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wcel(cv(hs0), c0)))
  df-clel(hs0, c1, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(csn(c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm disjsn(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ⋂ { c1 })= ∅ ↔ ¬ c1 ∈ c0)
} = {
  3bitri((c0 ⋂ { c1 })= ∅, ¬ c1 ∈ c0, ∀(hs0,(hs0 ∈ c0 → ¬ hs0 ∈ { c1 })), ∀(hs0, ¬(hs0 = c1 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0)))
  disj1(hs0, c0, { c1 })
  albii(hs0, (hs0 ∈ c0 → ¬ hs0 ∈ { c1 }), ¬(hs0 = c1 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0))
  3bitri((hs0 ∈ c0 → ¬ hs0 ∈ { c1 }), ¬(hs0 = c1 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0), (hs0 ∈ { c1 } → ¬ hs0 ∈ c0), (hs0 = c1 → ¬ hs0 ∈ c0))
  con2b(hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 ∈ { c1 })
  imbi1i(hs0 ∈ { c1 }, ¬ hs0 ∈ c0, hs0 = c1)
  velsn(hs0, c1)
  imnan(hs0 = c1, hs0 ∈ c0)
  xchbinxr(∀(hs0, ¬(hs0 = c1 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0)), c1 ∈ c0, ∃(hs0,(hs0 = c1 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0)))
  alnex(hs0, (hs0 = c1 ∧ hs0 ∈ c0))
  df-clel(hs0, c1, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c({ c1 })
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

blocks.name: disjpr2
blocks.content: Two completely distinct unordered pairs are disjoint. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 11-Nov-2017.) (Proof shortened by JJ, 23-Jul-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm disjpr2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wne(c0, c1), wne(c2, c1)), wa(wne(c0, c3), wne(c2, c3))), wceq(cin(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c1, c3)), emptycls))
} = {
  syl5eq(cin(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c1, c3)), emptycls, cun(cin(cpr(c0, c2), csn(c1)), cin(cpr(c0, c2), csn(c3))), wa(wa(wne(c0, c1), wne(c2, c1)), wa(wne(c0, c3), wne(c2, c3))))
  eqtri(cin(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c1, c3)), cun(cin(cpr(c0, c2), csn(c1)), cin(cpr(c0, c2), csn(c3))), cin(cpr(c0, c2), cun(csn(c1), csn(c3))))
  ineq2i(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c1, c3), cun(csn(c1), csn(c3)))
  df-pr(c1, c3)
  indi(cpr(c0, c2), csn(c1), csn(c3))
  syl6eq(cun(cin(cpr(c0, c2), csn(c1)), cin(cpr(c0, c2), csn(c3))), emptycls, cun(emptycls, emptycls), wa(wa(wne(c0, c1), wne(c2, c1)), wa(wne(c0, c3), wne(c2, c3))))
  uneq12d(cin(cpr(c0, c2), csn(c1)), cin(cpr(c0, c2), csn(c3)), emptycls, emptycls, wa(wa(wne(c0, c1), wne(c2, c1)), wa(wne(c0, c3), wne(c2, c3))))
  adantr(wa(wne(c0, c1), wne(c2, c1)), wa(wne(c0, c3), wne(c2, c3)), wceq(cin(cpr(c0, c2), csn(c1)), emptycls))
  syl5eq(cin(cpr(c0, c2), csn(c1)), emptycls, cun(cin(csn(c0), csn(c1)), cin(csn(c2), csn(c1))), wa(wne(c0, c1), wne(c2, c1)))
  eqtri(cin(cpr(c0, c2), csn(c1)), cun(cin(csn(c0), csn(c1)), cin(csn(c2), csn(c1))), cin(cun(csn(c0), csn(c2)), csn(c1)))
  ineq1i(cpr(c0, c2), csn(c1), cun(csn(c0), csn(c2)))
  indir(csn(c0), csn(c2), csn(c1))
  sylib(wa(wne(c0, c1), wne(c2, c1)), wceq(cun(cin(csn(c0), csn(c1)), cin(csn(c2), csn(c1))), emptycls), wa(wceq(cin(csn(c0), csn(c1)), emptycls), wceq(cin(csn(c2), csn(c1)), emptycls)))
  anim12i(wne(c0, c1), wne(c2, c1), wceq(cin(csn(c0), csn(c1)), emptycls), wceq(cin(csn(c2), csn(c1)), emptycls))
  disjsn2(c0, c1)
  disjsn2(c2, c1)
  un00(cin(csn(c0), csn(c1)), cin(csn(c2), csn(c1)))
  adantl(wa(wne(c0, c1), wne(c2, c1)), wa(wne(c0, c3), wne(c2, c3)), wceq(cin(cpr(c0, c2), csn(c3)), emptycls))
  syl5eq(cin(cpr(c0, c2), csn(c3)), emptycls, cun(cin(csn(c0), csn(c3)), cin(csn(c2), csn(c3))), wa(wne(c0, c3), wne(c2, c3)))
  eqtri(cin(cpr(c0, c2), csn(c3)), cun(cin(csn(c0), csn(c3)), cin(csn(c2), csn(c3))), cin(cun(csn(c0), csn(c2)), csn(c3)))
  ineq1i(cpr(c0, c2), csn(c3), cun(csn(c0), csn(c2)))
  df-pr(c0, c2)
  indir(csn(c0), csn(c2), csn(c3))
  sylib(wa(wne(c0, c3), wne(c2, c3)), wceq(cun(cin(csn(c0), csn(c3)), cin(csn(c2), csn(c3))), emptycls), wa(wceq(cin(csn(c0), csn(c3)), emptycls), wceq(cin(csn(c2), csn(c3)), emptycls)))
  anim12i(wne(c0, c3), wne(c2, c3), wceq(cin(csn(c0), csn(c3)), emptycls), wceq(cin(csn(c2), csn(c3)), emptycls))
  disjsn2(c0, c3)
  disjsn2(c2, c3)
  un00(cin(csn(c0), csn(c3)), cin(csn(c2), csn(c3)))
  un0(emptycls)
}

blocks.name: disjprsn

blocks.name: disjtpsn
blocks.content: The disjoint intersection of an unordered triple and a singleton. (Contributed by AV, 14-Nov-2021.)

} = {
  syl5eq(cin(ctp(c0, c2, c3), csn(c1)), emptycls, cin(cun(cpr(c0, c2), csn(c3)), csn(c1)), w3a(wne(c0, c1), wne(c2, c1), wne(c3, c1)))

  jca(w3a(wne(c0, c1), wne(c2, c1), wne(c3, c1)), wceq(cin(cpr(c0, c2), csn(c1)), emptycls), wceq(cin(csn(c3), csn(c1)), emptycls))
  3adant3(wne(c0, c1), wne(c2, c1), wne(c3, c1), wceq(cin(cpr(c0, c2), csn(c1)), emptycls))
  disjprsn(c0, c1, c2)
  3ad2ant3(wne(c0, c1), wne(c2, c1), wne(c3, c1), wceq(cin(csn(c3), csn(c1)), emptycls))

}

blocks.name: disjtp2

thm disjtp2(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {

  df-tp(c1, c4, c5)
  sylib(w3a(w3a(wne(c0, c1), wne(c2, c1), wne(c3, c1)), w3a(wne(c0, c4), wne(c2, c4), wne(c3, c4)), w3a(wne(c0, c5), wne(c2, c5), wne(c3, c5))), wceq(cin(ctp(c0, c2, c3), cun(cpr(c1, c4), csn(c5))), emptycls), wa(wceq(cin(ctp(c0, c2, c3), cpr(c1, c4)), emptycls), wceq(cin(ctp(c0, c2, c3), csn(c5)), emptycls)))
  jca(w3a(w3a(wne(c0, c1), wne(c2, c1), wne(c3, c1)), w3a(wne(c0, c4), wne(c2, c4), wne(c3, c4)), w3a(wne(c0, c5), wne(c2, c5), wne(c3, c5))), wceq(cin(ctp(c0, c2, c3), cpr(c1, c4)), emptycls), wceq(cin(ctp(c0, c2, c3), csn(c5)), emptycls))
  syl5eq(cin(ctp(c0, c2, c3), cpr(c1, c4)), emptycls, cin(cun(cpr(c0, c2), csn(c3)), cpr(c1, c4)), w3a(w3a(wne(c0, c1), wne(c2, c1), wne(c3, c1)), w3a(wne(c0, c4), wne(c2, c4), wne(c3, c4)), w3a(wne(c0, c5), wne(c2, c5), wne(c3, c5))))
  ineq1i(ctp(c0, c2, c3), cpr(c1, c4), cun(cpr(c0, c2), csn(c3)))
  df-tp(c0, c2, c3)
  sylib(w3a(w3a(wne(c0, c1), wne(c2, c1), wne(c3, c1)), w3a(wne(c0, c4), wne(c2, c4), wne(c3, c4)), w3a(wne(c0, c5), wne(c2, c5), wne(c3, c5))), wceq(cin(cun(cpr(c0, c2), csn(c3)), cpr(c1, c4)), emptycls), wa(wceq(cin(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c1, c4)), emptycls), wceq(cin(csn(c3), cpr(c1, c4)), emptycls)))
  jca(w3a(w3a(wne(c0, c1), wne(c2, c1), wne(c3, c1)), w3a(wne(c0, c4), wne(c2, c4), wne(c3, c4)), w3a(wne(c0, c5), wne(c2, c5), wne(c3, c5))), wceq(cin(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c1, c4)), emptycls), wceq(cin(csn(c3), cpr(c1, c4)), emptycls))
  3adant3(w3a(wne(c0, c1), wne(c2, c1), wne(c3, c1)), w3a(wne(c0, c4), wne(c2, c4), wne(c3, c4)), w3a(wne(c0, c5), wne(c2, c5), wne(c3, c5)), wceq(cin(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c1, c4)), emptycls))
  syl2an(w3a(wne(c0, c1), wne(c2, c1), wne(c3, c1)), w3a(wne(c0, c4), wne(c2, c4), wne(c3, c4)), wceq(cin(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c1, c4)), emptycls), wa(wne(c0, c1), wne(c2, c1)), wa(wne(c0, c4), wne(c2, c4)))
  3simpa(wne(c0, c1), wne(c2, c1), wne(c3, c1))
  3simpa(wne(c0, c4), wne(c2, c4), wne(c3, c4))

  syl5eq(cin(csn(c3), cpr(c1, c4)), emptycls, cin(cpr(c1, c4), csn(c3)), w3a(w3a(wne(c0, c1), wne(c2, c1), wne(c3, c1)), w3a(wne(c0, c4), wne(c2, c4), wne(c3, c4)), w3a(wne(c0, c5), wne(c2, c5), wne(c3, c5))))

  3adant3(w3a(wne(c0, c1), wne(c2, c1), wne(c3, c1)), w3a(wne(c0, c4), wne(c2, c4), wne(c3, c4)), w3a(wne(c0, c5), wne(c2, c5), wne(c3, c5)), wceq(cin(cpr(c1, c4), csn(c3)), emptycls))
  syl2an(w3a(wne(c0, c1), wne(c2, c1), wne(c3, c1)), w3a(wne(c0, c4), wne(c2, c4), wne(c3, c4)), wceq(cin(cpr(c1, c4), csn(c3)), emptycls), wne(c1, c3), wne(c4, c3))
  3ad2ant3(wne(c0, c1), wne(c2, c1), wne(c3, c1), wne(c1, c3))
  biimpi(wne(c3, c1), wne(c1, c3))
  necom(c3, c1)
  3ad2ant3(wne(c0, c4), wne(c2, c4), wne(c3, c4), wne(c4, c3))

  necom(c3, c4)

  undisj1(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c1, c4), csn(c3))

  disjtpsn(c0, c5, c2, c3)
  undisj2(ctp(c0, c2, c3), cpr(c1, c4), csn(c5))

blocks.name: snprc
blocks.content: The singleton of a proper class (one that doesn't exist) is the empty set. Theorem 7.2 of [Quine] p. 48. (Contributed by NM, 21-Jun-1993.)

blocks.name: snnzb
blocks.content: A singleton is nonempty iff its argument is a set. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 8-May-2018.)

blocks.name: rmosn
blocks.content: A restricted at-most-one quantifier over a singleton is always true. (Contributed by AV, 3-Apr-2023.)
blocks.origin:
thm rmosn(setvar s0, class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wrmo(s0, csn(c0), w0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  pm2.61i(wrmo(s0, csn(c0), w0), wcel(c0, universe))
  sylibr(wcel(c0, universe), wrmo(s0, csn(c0), w0), wi(wrex(s0, csn(c0), w0), wreu(s0, csn(c0), w0)))
  3imtr4d(wcel(c0, universe), wrex(s0, csn(c0), w0), wreu(s0, csn(c0), w0), wsbc(s0, c0, w0), wsbc(s0, c0, w0))
  idd(wcel(c0, universe), wsbc(s0, c0, w0))
  rexsngf(s0, c0, universe, w0, wsbc(s0, c0, w0))
  reusngf(s0, c0, universe, w0, wsbc(s0, c0, w0))
  nfsbc1v(s0, c0, w0)
  sbceq1a(s0, c0, w0)
  rmo5(s0, csn(c0), w0)
  mpbiri(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wrmo(s0, csn(c0), w0), wrmo(s0, emptycls, w0))
  rmo0(s0, w0)
  sylbi(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wb(wrmo(s0, csn(c0), w0), wrmo(s0, emptycls, w0)), wceq(csn(c0), emptycls))
  snprc(c0)
  rmoeq1(s0, csn(c0), emptycls, w0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c0)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rmosn(setvar s0, class c0, wff w0) {
  ⊢ ∃*(s0 ∈ { c0 }, w0)

  pm2.61i(∃*(s0 ∈ { c0 }, w0), c0 ∈ 𝕌)

  3imtr4d(c0 ∈ 𝕌, ∃(s0 ∈ { c0 }, w0), ∃!(s0 ∈ { c0 }, w0), [c0 / s0]w0, [c0 / s0]w0)

  orcd(wa(wcel(cv(s0), csn(c0)), w0), wa(wcel(cv(s0), csn(c0)), wsbc(s0, c0, w0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), emptycls), wn(wsbc(s0, c0, w0))))
  imdistani(wcel(cv(s0), csn(c0)), w0, wsbc(s0, c0, w0))

  jaoi(wa(wcel(cv(s0), csn(c0)), wsbc(s0, c0, w0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), emptycls), wn(wsbc(s0, c0, w0))), wa(wcel(cv(s0), csn(c0)), w0))
  imdistani(wcel(cv(s0), csn(c0)), wsbc(s0, c0, w0), w0)
  syl(wcel(cv(s0), csn(c0)), wi(wsbc(s0, c0, w0), w0), wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  elsni(cv(s0), c0)
  biimprd(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wsbc(s0, c0, w0), w0)
  sbceq1a(s0, c0, w0)
  adantr(wcel(cv(s0), emptycls), wn(wsbc(s0, c0, w0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), csn(c0)), w0))
  pm2.21i(wcel(cv(s0), emptycls), wa(wcel(cv(s0), csn(c0)), w0))
  noel(cv(s0))
  cbvab(s0, hs0, wo(wa(wcel(cv(s0), csn(c0)), wsbc(s0, c0, w0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), emptycls), wn(wsbc(s0, c0, w0)))), wo(wa(wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c0)), wsbc(s0, c0, w0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), emptycls), wn(wsbc(s0, c0, w0)))))
  nfv(hs0, wo(wa(wcel(cv(s0), csn(c0)), wsbc(s0, c0, w0)), wa(wcel(cv(s0), emptycls), wn(wsbc(s0, c0, w0)))))
  nfor(s0, wa(wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c0)), wsbc(s0, c0, w0)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), emptycls), wn(wsbc(s0, c0, w0))))

  nfan(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), emptycls), wn(wsbc(s0, c0, w0)))

blocks.name: rabsnif
blocks.content: A restricted class abstraction restricted to a singleton is either the empty set or the singleton itself. (Contributed by AV, 12-Apr-2019.) (Proof shortened by AV, 21-Jul-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm rabsnif(setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wceq(crab(s0, csn(c0), w0), cif(csn(c0), emptycls, w1))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
} = {
  pm2.61i(wceq(crab(s0, csn(c0), w0), cif(csn(c0), emptycls, w1)), wcel(c0, universe))
  syl5eq(crab(s0, csn(c0), w0), cif(csn(c0), emptycls, w1), cif(csn(c0), emptycls, wsbc(s0, c0, w0)), wcel(c0, universe))
  rabsnifsb(s0, c0, w0)
  ifbid(csn(c0), emptycls, wcel(c0, universe), wsbc(s0, c0, w0), w1)
  sbcieg(s0, c0, universe, w0, w1)
  3eqtr4a(crab(s0, csn(c0), w0), cif(csn(c0), emptycls, w1), crab(s0, emptycls, w0), cif(emptycls, emptycls, w1), wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  eqtr4i(crab(s0, emptycls, w0), cif(emptycls, emptycls, w1), emptycls)
  rab0(s0, w0)
  ifid(emptycls, w1)
  rabeqdv(s0, csn(c0), emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, universe)), w0)
  ifeq1d(csn(c0), emptycls, emptycls, wn(wcel(c0, universe)), w1)
  biimpi(wn(wcel(c0, universe)), wceq(csn(c0), emptycls))
  snprc(c0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c0)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rabsnif(setvar s0, class c0, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ { s0 ∈ { c0 } | w0 } = if(w1, { c0 }, ∅)
  ⊣ (s0 = c0 →(w0 ↔ w1))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, w1)
} = {
  pm2.61i({ s0 ∈ { c0 } | w0 } = if(w1, { c0 }, ∅), c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  syl5eq({ s0 ∈ { c0 } | w0 }, if(w1, { c0 }, ∅), if([c0 / s0]w0, { c0 }, ∅), c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  rabsnifsb(s0, c0, w0)
  ifbid({ c0 }, emptycls, c0 ∈ 𝕌, [c0 / s0]w0, w1)
  sbcieg(s0, c0, universe, w0, w1)
  3eqtr4a({ s0 ∈ { c0 } | w0 }, if(w1, { c0 }, ∅), { s0 ∈ ∅ | w0 }, if(w1, ∅, ∅), ¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  eqtr4i({ s0 ∈ ∅ | w0 }, if(w1, ∅, ∅), emptycls)
  rab0(s0, w0)
  ifid(emptycls, w1)
  rabeqdv(s0, { c0 }, emptycls, ¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌, w0)
  ifeq1d({ c0 }, emptycls, emptycls, ¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌, w1)
  biimpi(¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌, { c0 } = ∅)
  snprc(c0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c0)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: rabrsn
blocks.content: A restricted class abstraction restricted to a singleton is either the empty set or the singleton itself. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 22-Dec-2017.) (Proof shortened by AV, 21-Jul-2019.)
blocks.origin:
thm rabrsn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wceq(c0, crab(s0, csn(c1), w0)), wo(wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(c0, csn(c1))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  sylbi(wceq(c0, crab(s0, csn(c1), w0)), wo(wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(c0, csn(c1))), wceq(c0, cif(csn(c1), emptycls, wsbc(s0, c1, w0))))
  eqeq2i(c0, crab(s0, csn(c1), w0), cif(csn(c1), emptycls, wsbc(s0, c1, w0)))
  rabsnifsb(s0, c1, w0)
  mpbiri(wceq(c0, cif(csn(c1), emptycls, wsbc(s0, c1, w0))), wo(wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(c0, csn(c1))), wo(wceq(cif(csn(c1), emptycls, wsbc(s0, c1, w0)), emptycls), wceq(cif(csn(c1), emptycls, wsbc(s0, c1, w0)), csn(c1))))
  mpbi(wo(wceq(cif(csn(c1), emptycls, wsbc(s0, c1, w0)), emptycls), wceq(cif(csn(c1), emptycls, wsbc(s0, c1, w0)), csn(c1))), wo(wceq(cif(csn(c1), emptycls, wsbc(s0, c1, w0)), csn(c1)), wceq(cif(csn(c1), emptycls, wsbc(s0, c1, w0)), emptycls)))
  ifeqor(csn(c1), emptycls, wsbc(s0, c1, w0))
  orcom(wceq(cif(csn(c1), emptycls, wsbc(s0, c1, w0)), csn(c1)), wceq(cif(csn(c1), emptycls, wsbc(s0, c1, w0)), emptycls))
  orbi12d(wceq(c0, cif(csn(c1), emptycls, wsbc(s0, c1, w0))), wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(c0, csn(c1)), wceq(cif(csn(c1), emptycls, wsbc(s0, c1, w0)), emptycls), wceq(cif(csn(c1), emptycls, wsbc(s0, c1, w0)), csn(c1)))
  eqeq1(c0, cif(csn(c1), emptycls, wsbc(s0, c1, w0)), emptycls)
  eqeq1(c0, cif(csn(c1), emptycls, wsbc(s0, c1, w0)), csn(c1))
}

thm euabsn(setvar s0, wff w0) {
  |- wb(weu(s0, w0), wex(s0, wceq(cab(s0, w0), csn(cv(s0)))))
} = {
  bitr4i(weu(s0, w0), wex(s0, wceq(cab(s0, w0), csn(cv(s0)))), wex(hs0, wceq(cab(s0, w0), csn(cv(hs0)))))

blocks.pretty:
thm euabsn(setvar s0, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (∃!(s0, w0)↔ ∃(s0, { s0 | w0 } = { s0 }))
} = {
  bitr4i(∃!(s0, w0), ∃(s0, { s0 | w0 } = { s0 }), ∃(hs0, { s0 | w0 } = { hs0 }))
  euabsn2(s0, hs0, w0)
  cbvexv1(s0, hs0, { s0 | w0 } = { s0 }, { s0 | w0 } = { hs0 })
  nfv(hs0, { s0 | w0 } = { s0 })
  nfeq1(s0, { s0 | w0 }, { hs0 })
  nfab1(s0, w0)
  eqeq2d({ s0 | w0 }, { s0 }, { hs0 }, s0 = hs0)
  sneq(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w({ s0 | w0 } = { s0 })
  diff.csn.s(s0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)

blocks.name: reusn
blocks.content: A way to express restricted existential uniqueness of a wff: its restricted class abstraction is a singleton. (Contributed by NM, 30-May-2006.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 14-Nov-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm reusn(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0) {
  |- wb(wreu(s0, c0, w0), wex(s1, wceq(crab(s0, c0, w0), csn(cv(s1)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  3bitr4i(wreu(s0, c0, w0), wex(s1, wceq(crab(s0, c0, w0), csn(cv(s1)))), weu(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)), wex(s1, wceq(cab(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)), csn(cv(s1)))))
  euabsn2(s0, s1, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0))
  df-reu(s0, c0, w0)
  exbii(s1, wceq(crab(s0, c0, w0), csn(cv(s1))), wceq(cab(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)), csn(cv(s1))))
  eqeq1i(crab(s0, c0, w0), csn(cv(s1)), cab(s0, wa(wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)))
  df-rab(s0, c0, w0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, wcel(cv(s0), c0), w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm reusn(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (∃!(s0 ∈ c0, w0)↔ ∃(s1, { s0 ∈ c0 | w0 } = { s1 }))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
} = {
  3bitr4i(∃!(s0 ∈ c0, w0), ∃(s1, { s0 ∈ c0 | w0 } = { s1 }), ∃!(s0,(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ w0)), ∃(s1, { s0 |(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ w0)} = { s1 }))
  euabsn2(s0, s1, (s0 ∈ c0 ∧ w0))
  df-reu(s0, c0, w0)
  exbii(s1, { s0 ∈ c0 | w0 } = { s1 }, { s0 |(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ w0)} = { s1 })
  eqeq1i({ s0 ∈ c0 | w0 }, { s1 }, { s0 |(s0 ∈ c0 ∧ w0)})
  df-rab(s0, c0, w0)
  diff.wa.s(s1, s0 ∈ c0, w0)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: absneu
blocks.content: Restricted existential uniqueness determined by a singleton. (Contributed by NM, 29-May-2006.)
blocks.origin:
thm absneu(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cab(s0, w0), csn(c0))), weu(s0, w0))
} = {
  sylibr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cab(s0, w0), csn(c0))), weu(s0, w0), wex(hs0, wceq(cab(s0, w0), csn(cv(hs0)))))
  imp(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cab(s0, w0), csn(c0)), wex(hs0, wceq(cab(s0, w0), csn(cv(hs0)))))
  spcegv(hs0, c0, c1, wceq(cab(s0, w0), csn(c0)), wceq(cab(s0, w0), csn(cv(hs0))))
  eqeq2d(cab(s0, w0), csn(cv(hs0)), csn(c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  sneq(cv(hs0), c0)
  euabsn2(s0, hs0, w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(cab(s0, w0), csn(c0)))
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm absneu(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ { s0 | w0 } = { c0 })→ ∃!(s0, w0))
} = {
  sylibr((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ { s0 | w0 } = { c0 }), ∃!(s0, w0), ∃(hs0, { s0 | w0 } = { hs0 }))
  imp(c0 ∈ c1, { s0 | w0 } = { c0 }, ∃(hs0, { s0 | w0 } = { hs0 }))
  spcegv(hs0, c0, c1, { s0 | w0 } = { c0 }, { s0 | w0 } = { hs0 })
  eqeq2d({ s0 | w0 }, { hs0 }, { c0 }, hs0 = c0)

  euabsn2(s0, hs0, w0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)

blocks.name: rabsnt
blocks.content: Truth implied by equality of a restricted class abstraction and a singleton. (Contributed by NM, 29-May-2006.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 23-Dec-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm rabsnt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  |- wi(wceq(crab(s0, c0, w0), csn(c1)), w1)
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wb(w0, w1))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsw(s0, w1)
} = {
  syl(wceq(crab(s0, c0, w0), csn(c1)), w1, wcel(c1, crab(s0, c0, w0)))
  syl5eleqr(c1, crab(s0, c0, w0), csn(c1), wceq(crab(s0, c0, w0), csn(c1)))
  snid(c1)
  id(wceq(crab(s0, c0, w0), csn(c1)))
  simprbi(wcel(c1, crab(s0, c0, w0)), w1, wcel(c1, c0))
  elrab(s0, c1, c0, w0, w1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm rabsnt(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0, wff w1) {
  ⊢ ({ s0 ∈ c0 | w0 } = { c1 } → w1)
  ⊣ c1 ∈ 𝕌
  ⊣ (s0 = c1 →(w0 ↔ w1))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, w1)
} = {
  syl({ s0 ∈ c0 | w0 } = { c1 }, w1, c1 ∈ { s0 ∈ c0 | w0 })
  syl5eleqr(c1, { s0 ∈ c0 | w0 }, { c1 }, { s0 ∈ c0 | w0 } = { c1 })
  snid(c1)
  id({ s0 ∈ c0 | w0 } = { c1 })
  simprbi(c1 ∈ { s0 ∈ c0 | w0 }, w1, c1 ∈ c0)
  elrab(s0, c1, c0, w0, w1)
}

  a1i(w0, wb(wa(w0, w3a(w2, w3, w4)), w3a(wa(w0, w2), wa(w0, w3), wa(w0, w4))))
  an3andi(w0, w2, w3, w4)
  syl3anc(w0, wb(wral(s0, ctp(c0, c1, c2), wa(w0, w1)), w3a(wa(w0, w2), wa(w0, w3), wa(w0, w4))), wcel(c0, c3), wcel(c1, c4), wcel(c2, c5))

  tpnzd(c0, c1, c2, c3, w0)

thm snssg(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, c2), wss(csn(c0), c2)))
} = {
  3bitr4rd(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, c2), wss(csn(c0), c2), wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), wal(hs0, wi(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))))
  a1i(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2))), wal(hs0, wi(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))))
  albii(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)), wi(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))
  imbi1i(wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  velsn(hs0, c0)
  a1i(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wss(csn(c0), c2), wal(hs0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c2)))))
  dfss2(hs0, csn(c0), c2)
  clel2g(hs0, c0, c1, c2)

  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm snssg(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →(c0 ∈ c2 ↔ { c0 } ⊆ c2))
} = {
  3bitr4rd(c0 ∈ c1, c0 ∈ c2, { c0 } ⊆ c2, ∀(hs0,(hs0 ∈ { c0 } → hs0 ∈ c2)), ∀(hs0,(hs0 = c0 → hs0 ∈ c2)))
  a1i(c0 ∈ c1, (∀(hs0,(hs0 ∈ { c0 } → hs0 ∈ c2))↔ ∀(hs0,(hs0 = c0 → hs0 ∈ c2))))
  albii(hs0, (hs0 ∈ { c0 } → hs0 ∈ c2), (hs0 = c0 → hs0 ∈ c2))
  imbi1i(hs0 ∈ { c0 }, hs0 ∈ c2, hs0 = c0)
  velsn(hs0, c0)
  a1i(c0 ∈ c1, ({ c0 } ⊆ c2 ↔ ∀(hs0,(hs0 ∈ { c0 } → hs0 ∈ c2))))
  dfss2(hs0, { c0 }, c2)
  clel2g(hs0, c0, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.c({ c0 })
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
}

thm elpwdifsn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c0 ⊆ c2 ∧ c3 ∉ c0)→ c0 ∈ P((c2 \ { c3 })))
} = {
  mpbird((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c0 ⊆ c2 ∧ c3 ∉ c0), c0 ∈ P((c2 \ { c3 })), c0 ⊆(c2 \ { c3 }))

  anim1ci((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c0 ⊆ c2 ∧ c3 ∉ c0), hs0 ∈ c0, ¬ c3 ∈ c0)

  ralbii(s0, c0, wi(wne(cv(s0), c1), w0), wi(wnel(cv(s0), csn(c1)), w0))
  imbi1i(wne(cv(s0), c1), w0, wnel(cv(s0), csn(c1)))
  con4bii(wne(cv(s0), c1), wnel(cv(s0), csn(c1)))
  3bitr4ri(wn(wne(cv(s0), c1)), wn(wnel(cv(s0), csn(c1))), wcel(cv(s0), csn(c1)), wceq(cv(s0), c1))
  velsn(s0, c1)
  nnel(cv(s0), csn(c1))
  nne(cv(s0), c1)
  raldifb(s0, c0, csn(c1), w0)
}

blocks.name: eldifvsn
blocks.content: A set is an element of the universal class excluding a singleton iff it is not the singleton element. (Contributed by AV, 7-Apr-2019.)

blocks.name: difsn
blocks.content: An element not in a set can be removed without affecting the set. (Contributed by NM, 16-Mar-2006.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 29-Jun-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm difsn(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wn(wcel(c0, c1)), wceq(cdif(c1, csn(c0)), c1))
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, cdif(c1, csn(c0)), c1, wn(wcel(c0, c1)))
  syl5bb(wn(wcel(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(c1, csn(c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wne(cv(hs0), c0)))
  eldifsn(cv(hs0), c1, c0)
  impbid2(wn(wcel(c0, c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wne(cv(hs0), c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  simpl(wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wne(cv(hs0), c0))
  ancld(wn(wcel(c0, c1)), wcel(cv(hs0), c1), wne(cv(hs0), c0))
  nelelne(c0, c1, cv(hs0))
  diff.hs0.c(cdif(c1, csn(c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wn(wcel(c0, c1)))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm difsn(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (¬ c0 ∈ c1 →(c1 \ { c0 })= c1)
} = {
  eqrdv(hs0, (c1 \ { c0 }), c1, ¬ c0 ∈ c1)
  syl5bb(¬ c0 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈(c1 \ { c0 }), hs0 ∈ c1, (hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs0 ≠ c0))
  eldifsn(hs0, c1, c0)
  impbid2(¬ c0 ∈ c1, (hs0 ∈ c1 ∧ hs0 ≠ c0), hs0 ∈ c1)
  simpl(hs0 ∈ c1, hs0 ≠ c0)
  ancld(¬ c0 ∈ c1, hs0 ∈ c1, hs0 ≠ c0)
  nelelne(c0, c1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.c((c1 \ { c0 }))
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(¬ c0 ∈ c1)
}

blocks.name: difprsnss
blocks.content: Removal of a singleton from an unordered pair. (Contributed by NM, 16-Mar-2006.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 29-Jun-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm difprsnss(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wss(cdif(cpr(c0, c1), csn(c0)), csn(c1))
} = {
  ssriv(hs0, cdif(cpr(c0, c1), csn(c0)), csn(c1))
  3imtr4i(wcel(cv(hs0), cdif(cpr(c0, c1), csn(c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c1)), wa(wcel(cv(hs0), cpr(c0, c1)), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c0)))), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  syl2anb(wcel(cv(hs0), cpr(c0, c1)), wn(wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c0))), wceq(cv(hs0), c1), wo(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1)), wn(wceq(cv(hs0), c0)))
  elpr(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  vex(hs0)
  notbii(wcel(cv(hs0), csn(c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  velsn(hs0, c0)
  biimparc(wo(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1)), wn(wceq(cv(hs0), c0)), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  biorf(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c1))
  eldif(cv(hs0), cpr(c0, c1), csn(c0))
  velsn(hs0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cdif(cpr(c0, c1), csn(c0)))
  diff.hs0.c(csn(c1))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm difprsnss(class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ ({ c0, c1 } \ { c0 })⊆ { c1 }
} = {
  ssriv(hs0, ({ c0, c1 } \ { c0 }), { c1 })
  3imtr4i(hs0 ∈({ c0, c1 } \ { c0 }), hs0 ∈ { c1 }, (hs0 ∈ { c0, c1 } ∧ ¬ hs0 ∈ { c0 }), hs0 = c1)
  syl2anb(hs0 ∈ { c0, c1 }, ¬ hs0 ∈ { c0 }, hs0 = c1, (hs0 = c0 ∨ hs0 = c1), ¬ hs0 = c0)
  elpr(hs0, c0, c1)
  vex(hs0)
  notbii(hs0 ∈ { c0 }, hs0 = c0)
  velsn(hs0, c0)
  biimparc((hs0 = c0 ∨ hs0 = c1), ¬ hs0 = c0, hs0 = c1)
  biorf(hs0 = c0, hs0 = c1)
  eldif(hs0, { c0, c1 }, { c0 })
  velsn(hs0, c1)
  diff.hs0.c(({ c0, c1 } \ { c0 }))
  diff.hs0.c({ c1 })
}

blocks.name: difprsn1

  equncomi(cpr(c0, c1), csn(c1), csn(c0))

  difun2(csn(c1), csn(c0))
}

blocks.name: diftpsn3

blocks.name: difpr

blocks.name: difsnb
blocks.content: ` ( B \ { A } ) ` equals ` B ` if and only if ` A ` is not a member of ` B ` . Generalization of ~ difsn . (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)

blocks.name: difsnpss
blocks.content: ` ( B \ { A } ) ` is a proper subclass of ` B ` if and only if ` A ` is a member of ` B ` . (Contributed by David Moews, 1-May-2017.)

blocks.name: snssi
blocks.content: The singleton of an element of a class is a subset of the class. (Contributed by NM, 6-Jun-1994.)

blocks.name: snssd
blocks.content: The singleton of an element of a class is a subset of the class (deduction form). (Contributed by Jonathan Ben-Naim, 3-Jun-2011.)

blocks.name: difsnid
blocks.content: If we remove a single element from a class then put it back in, we end up with the original class. (Contributed by NM, 2-Oct-2006.)

blocks.name: eldifeldifsn
blocks.content: An element of a difference set is an element of the difference with a singleton. (Contributed by AV, 2-Jan-2022.)

blocks.name: pw0
blocks.content: Compute the power set of the empty set. Theorem 89 of [Suppes] p. 47. (Contributed by NM, 5-Aug-1993.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 29-Jun-2011.)

blocks.name: pwpw0

blocks.name: eqsn
blocks.content: Two ways to express that a nonempty set equals a singleton. (Contributed by NM, 15-Dec-2007.) (Proof shortened by JJ, 23-Jul-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm eqsn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wne(c0, emptycls), wb(wceq(c0, csn(c1)), wral(s0, c0, wceq(cv(s0), c1))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
} = {
  syl6bb(wne(c0, emptycls), wceq(c0, csn(c1)), wral(s0, c0, wceq(cv(s0), c1)), wo(wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(c0, csn(c1))))
  sylbi(wne(c0, emptycls), wb(wceq(c0, csn(c1)), wo(wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(c0, csn(c1)))), wn(wceq(c0, emptycls)))
  df-ne(c0, emptycls)
  biorf(wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(c0, csn(c1)))
  3bitr3i(wo(wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(c0, csn(c1))), wral(s0, c0, wceq(cv(s0), c1)), wss(c0, csn(c1)), wral(s0, c0, wcel(cv(s0), csn(c1))))
  dfss3(s0, c0, csn(c1))
  sssn(c0, c1)
  ralbii(s0, c0, wcel(cv(s0), csn(c1)), wceq(cv(s0), c1))
  velsn(s0, c1)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm eqsn(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ (c0 ≠ ∅ →(c0 = { c1 } ↔ ∀(s0 ∈ c0, s0 = c1)))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
} = {
  syl6bb(c0 ≠ ∅, c0 = { c1 }, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, s0 = c1), (c0 = ∅ ∨ c0 = { c1 }))
  sylbi(c0 ≠ ∅, (c0 = { c1 } ↔(c0 = ∅ ∨ c0 = { c1 })), ¬ c0 = ∅)
  df-ne(c0, emptycls)
  biorf(c0 = ∅, c0 = { c1 })
  3bitr3i((c0 = ∅ ∨ c0 = { c1 }), ∀(s0 ∈ c0, s0 = c1), c0 ⊆ { c1 }, ∀(s0 ∈ c0, s0 ∈ { c1 }))
  dfss3(s0, c0, { c1 })
  sssn(c0, c1)
  ralbii(s0, c0, s0 ∈ { c1 }, s0 = c1)
  velsn(s0, c1)
  diff.csn.s(s0, c1)
}

blocks.name: issn
blocks.content: A sufficient condition for a (nonempty) set to be a singleton. (Contributed by AV, 20-Sep-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm issn(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  |- wi(wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wex(s2, wceq(c0, csn(cv(s2)))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wex(s2, wceq(c0, csn(cv(s2))))), diffss(s1, s2))
  rexlimiv(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wex(s2, wceq(c0, csn(cv(s2)))))
  sylbid(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, c0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wex(s2, wceq(c0, csn(cv(s2)))), wceq(c0, csn(cv(s0))))
  bitr4d(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wral(s1, c0, wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1))), wceq(c0, csn(cv(s0))), wral(s1, c0, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))))
  ralbidv(s1, c0, wcel(cv(s0), c0), wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))
  a1i(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wb(wceq(cv(s0), cv(s1)), wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0))))
  equcom(s0, s1)
  syl(wcel(cv(s0), c0), wb(wceq(c0, csn(cv(s0))), wral(s1, c0, wceq(cv(s1), cv(s0)))), wne(c0, emptycls))
  ne0i(cv(s0), c0)
  eqsn(s1, c0, cv(s0))
  spcegv(s2, cv(s0), c0, wceq(c0, csn(cv(s0))), wceq(c0, csn(cv(s2))))
  eqeq2d(c0, csn(cv(s2)), csn(cv(s0)), wceq(cv(s2), cv(s0)))
  sneq(cv(s2), cv(s0))
  diff.wex.s(s0, s2, wceq(c0, csn(cv(s2))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c0, csn(cv(s2)))
  diff.csn.s(s0, cv(s2))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, cv(s0), c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, c0, csn(cv(s0)))
  diff.csn.s(s2, cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm issn(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  ⊢ (∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, s0 = s1))→ ∃(s2, c0 = { s2 }))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s1, c0)
  ⊣ d(s2, c0)
} = {
  a1ii((∃(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, s0 = s1))→ ∃(s2, c0 = { s2 })), d(s1, s2))
  rexlimiv(s0, c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, s0 = s1), ∃(s2, c0 = { s2 }))
  sylbid(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, s0 = s1), ∃(s2, c0 = { s2 }), c0 = { s0 })
  bitr4d(s0 ∈ c0, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, s0 = s1), c0 = { s0 }, ∀(s1 ∈ c0, s1 = s0))
  ralbidv(s1, c0, s0 ∈ c0, s0 = s1, s1 = s0)
  a1i(s0 ∈ c0, (s0 = s1 ↔ s1 = s0))
  equcom(s0, s1)
  syl(s0 ∈ c0, (c0 = { s0 } ↔ ∀(s1 ∈ c0, s1 = s0)), c0 ≠ ∅)
  ne0i(s0, c0)
  eqsn(s1, c0, s0)
  spcegv(s2, s0, c0, c0 = { s0 }, c0 = { s2 })
  eqeq2d(c0, { s2 }, { s0 }, s2 = s0)
  sneq(s2, s0)
  diff.wex.s(s0, s2, c0 = { s2 })
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c0, { s2 })
  diff.csn.s(s0, s2)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s2)
  diff.wcel.s(s1, s0, c0)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s2, c0, { s0 })
  diff.csn.s(s2, s0)
  diff.cv.s(s2, s0)
  diffss.ex(s2, s0)
}

blocks.name: n0snor2el
blocks.content: A nonempty set is either a singleton or contains at least two different elements. (Contributed by AV, 20-Sep-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm n0snor2el(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0) {
  |- wi(wne(c0, emptycls), wo(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wex(s2, wceq(c0, csn(cv(s2))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wne(c0, emptycls), wo(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wex(s2, wceq(c0, csn(cv(s2)))))), diffss(s0, s2))
  pm2.61i(wi(wne(c0, emptycls), wo(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wex(s2, wceq(c0, csn(cv(s2)))))), wrex(hs0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))))
  a1d(wrex(hs0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))), wne(c0, emptycls), wo(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wex(s2, wceq(c0, csn(cv(s2))))))
  olcd(wrex(hs0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wex(s2, wceq(c0, csn(cv(s2)))))
  issn(hs0, s1, s2, c0)
  sylbir(wn(wrex(hs0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1))))), wi(wne(c0, emptycls), wo(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wex(s2, wceq(c0, csn(cv(s2)))))), wral(hs0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wne(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))))
  bitri(wral(hs0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wne(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))), wn(wrex(hs0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1))))), wral(hs0, c0, wn(wral(s1, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1))))))
  ralbii(hs0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wne(cv(hs0), cv(s1))), wn(wral(s1, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))))
  bitri(wrex(s1, c0, wne(cv(hs0), cv(s1))), wn(wral(s1, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))), wrex(s1, c0, wn(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))))
  rexbii(s1, c0, wne(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wn(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1))))
  df-ne(cv(hs0), cv(s1))
  rexnal(s1, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))
  ralnex(hs0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s1))))
  ex(wral(hs0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wne(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))), wne(c0, emptycls), wo(wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wex(s2, wceq(c0, csn(cv(s2))))))
  orcd(wa(wral(hs0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wne(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))), wne(c0, emptycls)), wrex(s0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)))), wex(s2, wceq(c0, csn(cv(s2)))))
  reximdva0(s0, c0, wral(hs0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wne(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))), wrex(s1, c0, wne(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  rspccva(hs0, c0, cv(s0), wrex(s1, c0, wne(cv(hs0), cv(s1))), wrex(s1, c0, wne(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  rexbidv(s1, c0, wceq(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), wne(cv(hs0), cv(s1)), wne(cv(s0), cv(s1)))
  neeq1(cv(hs0), cv(s0), cv(s1))
  diff.hs0.s(s2)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.wral.s(s0, hs0, c0, wrex(s1, c0, wne(cv(hs0), cv(s1))))
  diff.wrex.s(s0, s1, c0, wne(cv(hs0), cv(s1)))
  diff.wne.s(s0, cv(hs0), cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.hs0.c(cv(s0))
  diff.hs0.w(wrex(s1, c0, wne(cv(s0), cv(s1))))
  diff.wceq.s(s1, cv(hs0), cv(s0))
  diff.cv.s(s1, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s1, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.cv.s(s1, s0)
  diffss.ex(s1, s0)
}

blocks.name: ssunpr
blocks.content: Possible values for a set sandwiched between another set and it plus a singleton. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jul-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm ssunpr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wb(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, cun(c0, cpr(c2, c3)))), wo(wo(wceq(c1, c0), wceq(c1, cun(c0, csn(c2)))), wo(wceq(c1, cun(c0, csn(c3))), wceq(c1, cun(c0, cpr(c2, c3))))))
} = {
  3bitri(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, cun(c0, cpr(c2, c3)))), wo(wo(wceq(c1, c0), wceq(c1, cun(c0, csn(c2)))), wo(wceq(c1, cun(c0, csn(c3))), wceq(c1, cun(c0, cpr(c2, c3))))), wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, cun(cun(c0, csn(c2)), csn(c3)))), wo(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, cun(c0, csn(c2)))), wa(wss(cun(c0, csn(c3)), c1), wss(c1, cun(cun(c0, csn(c2)), csn(c3))))))
  anbi2i(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, cun(c0, cpr(c2, c3))), wss(c1, cun(cun(c0, csn(c2)), csn(c3))))
  sseq2i(c1, cun(c0, cpr(c2, c3)), cun(cun(c0, csn(c2)), csn(c3)))
  ssunsn2(c0, c1, cun(c0, csn(c2)), c3)
  orbi12i(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, cun(c0, csn(c2)))), wa(wss(cun(c0, csn(c3)), c1), wss(c1, cun(cun(c0, csn(c2)), csn(c3)))), wo(wceq(c1, c0), wceq(c1, cun(c0, csn(c2)))), wo(wceq(c1, cun(c0, csn(c3))), wceq(c1, cun(c0, cpr(c2, c3)))))
  ssunsn(c0, c1, c2)
  3bitri(wa(wss(cun(c0, csn(c3)), c1), wss(c1, cun(cun(c0, csn(c2)), csn(c3)))), wo(wceq(c1, cun(c0, csn(c3))), wceq(c1, cun(c0, cpr(c2, c3)))), wa(wss(cun(c0, csn(c3)), c1), wss(c1, cun(cun(c0, csn(c3)), csn(c2)))), wo(wceq(c1, cun(c0, csn(c3))), wceq(c1, cun(cun(c0, csn(c3)), csn(c2)))))
  anbi2i(wss(cun(c0, csn(c3)), c1), wss(c1, cun(cun(c0, csn(c2)), csn(c3))), wss(c1, cun(cun(c0, csn(c3)), csn(c2))))
  sseq2i(c1, cun(cun(c0, csn(c2)), csn(c3)), cun(cun(c0, csn(c3)), csn(c2)))
  ssunsn(cun(c0, csn(c3)), c1, c2)
  orbi2i(wceq(c1, cun(c0, csn(c3))), wceq(c1, cun(cun(c0, csn(c3)), csn(c2))), wceq(c1, cun(c0, cpr(c2, c3))))
  eqeq2i(c1, cun(cun(c0, csn(c3)), csn(c2)), cun(c0, cpr(c2, c3)))
  eqtr2i(cun(cun(c0, csn(c3)), csn(c2)), cun(c0, cpr(c2, c3)), cun(cun(c0, csn(c2)), csn(c3)))
  eqtr4i(cun(c0, cpr(c2, c3)), cun(cun(c0, csn(c2)), csn(c3)), cun(c0, cun(csn(c2), csn(c3))))
  uneq2i(c0, cpr(c2, c3), cun(csn(c2), csn(c3)))
  df-pr(c2, c3)
  unass(c0, csn(c2), csn(c3))
  un23(c0, csn(c2), csn(c3))
}

blocks.name: sspr
blocks.content: The subsets of a pair. (Contributed by NM, 16-Mar-2006.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jul-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm sspr(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wb(wss(c0, cpr(c1, c2)), wo(wo(wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(c0, csn(c1))), wo(wceq(c0, csn(c2)), wceq(c0, cpr(c1, c2)))))
} = {
  3bitri(wss(c0, cpr(c1, c2)), wo(wo(wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(c0, csn(c1))), wo(wceq(c0, csn(c2)), wceq(c0, cpr(c1, c2)))), wa(wss(emptycls, c0), wss(c0, cun(emptycls, cpr(c1, c2)))), wo(wo(wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(c0, cun(emptycls, csn(c1)))), wo(wceq(c0, cun(emptycls, csn(c2))), wceq(c0, cun(emptycls, cpr(c1, c2))))))
  bitr3i(wss(c0, cpr(c1, c2)), wa(wss(emptycls, c0), wss(c0, cun(emptycls, cpr(c1, c2)))), wss(c0, cun(emptycls, cpr(c1, c2))))
  sseq2i(c0, cun(emptycls, cpr(c1, c2)), cpr(c1, c2))
