  0ss(c0)
  ssunpr(emptycls, c0, c1, c2)
  orbi12i(wo(wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(c0, cun(emptycls, csn(c1)))), wo(wceq(c0, cun(emptycls, csn(c2))), wceq(c0, cun(emptycls, cpr(c1, c2)))), wo(wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(c0, csn(c1))), wo(wceq(c0, csn(c2)), wceq(c0, cpr(c1, c2))))
  orbi2i(wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(c0, cun(emptycls, csn(c1))), wceq(c0, csn(c1)))
  eqeq2i(c0, cun(emptycls, csn(c1)), csn(c1))
  eqtri(cun(emptycls, csn(c1)), csn(c1), cun(csn(c1), emptycls))
  uncom(emptycls, csn(c1))
  un0(csn(c1))
  orbi12i(wceq(c0, cun(emptycls, csn(c2))), wceq(c0, cun(emptycls, cpr(c1, c2))), wceq(c0, csn(c2)), wceq(c0, cpr(c1, c2)))
  eqeq2i(c0, cun(emptycls, csn(c2)), csn(c2))
  eqtri(cun(emptycls, csn(c2)), csn(c2), cun(csn(c2), emptycls))
  uncom(emptycls, csn(c2))
  un0(csn(c2))
  eqeq2i(c0, cun(emptycls, cpr(c1, c2)), cpr(c1, c2))
  eqtri(cun(emptycls, cpr(c1, c2)), cpr(c1, c2), cun(cpr(c1, c2), emptycls))
  uncom(emptycls, cpr(c1, c2))
  un0(cpr(c1, c2))
}

blocks.name: sstp
blocks.content: The subsets of a triple. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jul-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm sstp(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wb(wss(c0, ctp(c1, c2, c3)), wo(wo(wo(wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(c0, csn(c1))), wo(wceq(c0, csn(c2)), wceq(c0, cpr(c1, c2)))), wo(wo(wceq(c0, csn(c3)), wceq(c0, cpr(c1, c3))), wo(wceq(c0, cpr(c2, c3)), wceq(c0, ctp(c1, c2, c3))))))
} = {
  3bitri(wss(c0, ctp(c1, c2, c3)), wo(wo(wo(wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(c0, csn(c1))), wo(wceq(c0, csn(c2)), wceq(c0, cpr(c1, c2)))), wo(wo(wceq(c0, csn(c3)), wceq(c0, cpr(c1, c3))), wo(wceq(c0, cpr(c2, c3)), wceq(c0, ctp(c1, c2, c3))))), wss(c0, cun(cpr(c1, c2), csn(c3))), wa(wss(emptycls, c0), wss(c0, cun(cpr(c1, c2), csn(c3)))))
  sseq2i(c0, ctp(c1, c2, c3), cun(cpr(c1, c2), csn(c3)))
  biantrur(wss(c0, cun(cpr(c1, c2), csn(c3))), wss(emptycls, c0))
  bitri(wa(wss(emptycls, c0), wss(c0, cun(cpr(c1, c2), csn(c3)))), wo(wo(wo(wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(c0, csn(c1))), wo(wceq(c0, csn(c2)), wceq(c0, cpr(c1, c2)))), wo(wo(wceq(c0, csn(c3)), wceq(c0, cpr(c1, c3))), wo(wceq(c0, cpr(c2, c3)), wceq(c0, ctp(c1, c2, c3))))), wo(wa(wss(emptycls, c0), wss(c0, cpr(c1, c2))), wa(wss(cun(emptycls, csn(c3)), c0), wss(c0, cun(cpr(c1, c2), csn(c3))))))
  ssunsn2(emptycls, c0, cpr(c1, c2), c3)
  orbi12i(wa(wss(emptycls, c0), wss(c0, cpr(c1, c2))), wa(wss(cun(emptycls, csn(c3)), c0), wss(c0, cun(cpr(c1, c2), csn(c3)))), wo(wo(wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(c0, csn(c1))), wo(wceq(c0, csn(c2)), wceq(c0, cpr(c1, c2)))), wo(wo(wceq(c0, csn(c3)), wceq(c0, cpr(c1, c3))), wo(wceq(c0, cpr(c2, c3)), wceq(c0, ctp(c1, c2, c3)))))
  bitr3i(wa(wss(emptycls, c0), wss(c0, cpr(c1, c2))), wo(wo(wceq(c0, emptycls), wceq(c0, csn(c1))), wo(wceq(c0, csn(c2)), wceq(c0, cpr(c1, c2)))), wss(c0, cpr(c1, c2)))
  biantrur(wss(c0, cpr(c1, c2)), wss(emptycls, c0))
  0ss(c0)
  sspr(c0, c1, c2)
  3bitri(wa(wss(cun(emptycls, csn(c3)), c0), wss(c0, cun(cpr(c1, c2), csn(c3)))), wo(wo(wceq(c0, csn(c3)), wceq(c0, cpr(c1, c3))), wo(wceq(c0, cpr(c2, c3)), wceq(c0, ctp(c1, c2, c3)))), wa(wss(csn(c3), c0), wss(c0, cun(csn(c3), cpr(c1, c2)))), wo(wo(wceq(c0, csn(c3)), wceq(c0, cun(csn(c3), csn(c1)))), wo(wceq(c0, cun(csn(c3), csn(c2))), wceq(c0, cun(csn(c3), cpr(c1, c2))))))
  anbi12i(wss(cun(emptycls, csn(c3)), c0), wss(c0, cun(cpr(c1, c2), csn(c3))), wss(csn(c3), c0), wss(c0, cun(csn(c3), cpr(c1, c2))))
  sseq1i(cun(emptycls, csn(c3)), c0, csn(c3))
  eqtri(cun(emptycls, csn(c3)), csn(c3), cun(csn(c3), emptycls))
  uncom(emptycls, csn(c3))
  un0(csn(c3))
  sseq2i(c0, cun(cpr(c1, c2), csn(c3)), cun(csn(c3), cpr(c1, c2)))
  ssunpr(csn(c3), c0, c1, c2)
  orbi12i(wo(wceq(c0, csn(c3)), wceq(c0, cun(csn(c3), csn(c1)))), wo(wceq(c0, cun(csn(c3), csn(c2))), wceq(c0, cun(csn(c3), cpr(c1, c2)))), wo(wceq(c0, csn(c3)), wceq(c0, cpr(c1, c3))), wo(wceq(c0, cpr(c2, c3)), wceq(c0, ctp(c1, c2, c3))))
  orbi2i(wceq(c0, csn(c3)), wceq(c0, cun(csn(c3), csn(c1))), wceq(c0, cpr(c1, c3)))
  eqeq2i(c0, cun(csn(c3), csn(c1)), cpr(c1, c3))
  eqtr4i(cun(csn(c3), csn(c1)), cpr(c1, c3), cun(csn(c1), csn(c3)))
  uncom(csn(c3), csn(c1))
  df-pr(c1, c3)
  orbi12i(wceq(c0, cun(csn(c3), csn(c2))), wceq(c0, cun(csn(c3), cpr(c1, c2))), wceq(c0, cpr(c2, c3)), wceq(c0, ctp(c1, c2, c3)))
  eqeq2i(c0, cun(csn(c3), csn(c2)), cpr(c2, c3))
  eqtr4i(cun(csn(c3), csn(c2)), cpr(c2, c3), cun(csn(c2), csn(c3)))
  uncom(csn(c3), csn(c2))
  df-pr(c2, c3)
  eqeq2i(c0, cun(csn(c3), cpr(c1, c2)), ctp(c1, c2, c3))
  eqtr2i(cun(csn(c3), cpr(c1, c2)), ctp(c1, c2, c3), cun(cpr(c1, c2), csn(c3)))
  df-tp(c1, c2, c3)
  uncom(cpr(c1, c2), csn(c3))
}

blocks.name: tpss
blocks.content: A triplet of elements of a class is a subset of the class. (Contributed by NM, 9-Apr-1994.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 29-Jun-2011.)
blocks.origin:
thm tpss(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wb(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), wss(ctp(c0, c2, c3), c1))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wcel(c2, universe)
  -| wcel(c3, universe)
} = {
  3bitr4i(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), wss(ctp(c0, c2, c3), c1), wa(wss(cpr(c0, c2), c1), wss(csn(c3), c1)), wss(cun(cpr(c0, c2), csn(c3)), c1))
  unss(cpr(c0, c2), c1, csn(c3))
  bitri(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1)), wa(wss(cpr(c0, c2), c1), wss(csn(c3), c1)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c3, c1)))
  df-3an(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, c1))
  anbi12i(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c3, c1), wss(cpr(c0, c2), c1), wss(csn(c3), c1))
  prss(c0, c1, c2)
  snss(c3, c1)
  sseq1i(ctp(c0, c2, c3), c1, cun(cpr(c0, c2), csn(c3)))
  df-tp(c0, c2, c3)
}

blocks.name: tpssi
blocks.content: A triple of elements of a class is a subset of the class. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 1-Feb-2018.)

blocks.name: sneqrg
blocks.content: Closed form of ~ sneqr . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 1-Apr-2011.) (Proof shortened by JJ, 23-Jul-2021.)

blocks.name: sneqr
blocks.content: If the singletons of two sets are equal, the two sets are equal. Part of Exercise 4 of [TakeutiZaring] p. 15. (Contributed by NM, 27-Aug-1993.)

blocks.name: snsssn
blocks.content: If a singleton is a subset of another, their members are equal. (Contributed by NM, 28-May-2006.)

blocks.name: mosneq
blocks.content: There exists at most one set whose singleton is equal to a given class. See also ~ moeq . (Contributed by BJ, 24-Sep-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm mosneq(setvar s0, class c0) {
  |- wmo(s0, wceq(csn(cv(s0)), c0))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
} = {
  mpbir(wmo(s0, wceq(csn(cv(s0)), c0)), wal(s0, wal(hs0, wi(wa(wceq(csn(cv(s0)), c0), wceq(csn(cv(hs0)), c0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))))
  gen2(s0, hs0, wi(wa(wceq(csn(cv(s0)), c0), wceq(csn(cv(hs0)), c0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))))
  syl(wa(wceq(csn(cv(s0)), c0), wceq(csn(cv(hs0)), c0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)), wceq(csn(cv(s0)), csn(cv(hs0))))
  eqtr3(csn(cv(s0)), c0, csn(cv(hs0)))
  sneqr(cv(s0), cv(hs0))
  vex(s0)
  mo4(s0, hs0, wceq(csn(cv(s0)), c0), wceq(csn(cv(hs0)), c0))
  eqeq1d(csn(cv(s0)), c0, csn(cv(hs0)), wceq(cv(s0), cv(hs0)))
  sneq(cv(s0), cv(hs0))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, csn(cv(hs0)), c0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, cv(hs0))
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w(wceq(csn(cv(s0)), c0))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm mosneq(setvar s0, class c0) {
  ⊢ ∃*(s0, { s0 } = c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
} = {
  mpbir(∃*(s0, { s0 } = c0), ∀(s0, ∀(hs0,(({ s0 } = c0 ∧ { hs0 } = c0)→ s0 = hs0))))
  gen2(s0, hs0, (({ s0 } = c0 ∧ { hs0 } = c0)→ s0 = hs0))
  syl(({ s0 } = c0 ∧ { hs0 } = c0), s0 = hs0, { s0 } = { hs0 })
  eqtr3({ s0 }, c0, { hs0 })
  sneqr(s0, hs0)
  vex(s0)
  mo4(s0, hs0, { s0 } = c0, { hs0 } = c0)
  eqeq1d({ s0 }, c0, { hs0 }, s0 = hs0)
  sneq(s0, hs0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, { hs0 }, c0)
  diff.csn.s(s0, hs0)
  diff.cv.s(s0, hs0)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.w({ s0 } = c0)
}

blocks.name: sneqbg
blocks.content: Two singletons of sets are equal iff their elements are equal. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 16-Apr-2012.)

blocks.name: snsspw
blocks.content: The singleton of a class is a subset of its power class. (Contributed by NM, 21-Jun-1993.)

blocks.name: prsspw
blocks.content: An unordered pair belongs to the power class of a class iff each member belongs to the class. (Contributed by NM, 10-Dec-2003.) (Proof shortened by Andrew Salmon, 26-Jun-2011.) (Proof shortened by OpenAI, 25-Mar-2020.)

blocks.name: preq1b
blocks.content: Biconditional equality lemma for unordered pairs, deduction form. Two unordered pairs have the same second element iff the first elements are equal. (Contributed by AV, 18-Dec-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm preq1b(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wceq(cpr(c0, c1), cpr(c2, c1)), wceq(c0, c2)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c4))
} = {
  impbid1(w0, wceq(cpr(c0, c1), cpr(c2, c1)), wceq(c0, c2))
  ex(w0, wceq(cpr(c0, c1), cpr(c2, c1)), wceq(c0, c2))
  oplem1(wa(w0, wceq(cpr(c0, c1), cpr(c2, c1))), wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c0), wceq(c2, c1))
  imp(w0, wceq(cpr(c0, c1), cpr(c2, c1)), wo(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c0, c1)))
  sylibd(w0, wceq(cpr(c0, c1), cpr(c2, c1)), wo(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c0, c1)), wcel(c0, cpr(c2, c1)))
  syl5ibcom(w0, wceq(cpr(c0, c1), cpr(c2, c1)), wcel(c0, cpr(c2, c1)), wcel(c0, cpr(c0, c1)))
  syl(w0, wcel(c0, cpr(c0, c1)), wcel(c0, c3))
  prid1g(c0, c3, c1)
  eleq2(cpr(c0, c1), cpr(c2, c1), c0)
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(c0, cpr(c2, c1)), wo(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c0, c1))), wcel(c0, c3))
  elprg(c0, c3, c2, c1)
  imp(w0, wceq(cpr(c0, c1), cpr(c2, c1)), wo(wceq(c2, c0), wceq(c2, c1)))
  sylibd(w0, wceq(cpr(c0, c1), cpr(c2, c1)), wo(wceq(c2, c0), wceq(c2, c1)), wcel(c2, cpr(c0, c1)))
  syl5ibrcom(w0, wceq(cpr(c0, c1), cpr(c2, c1)), wcel(c2, cpr(c0, c1)), wcel(c2, cpr(c2, c1)))
  syl(w0, wcel(c2, cpr(c2, c1)), wcel(c2, c4))
  prid1g(c2, c4, c1)
  eleq2(cpr(c0, c1), cpr(c2, c1), c2)
  syl(w0, wb(wcel(c2, cpr(c0, c1)), wo(wceq(c2, c0), wceq(c2, c1))), wcel(c2, c4))
  elprg(c2, c4, c0, c1)
  eqcom(c0, c2)
  eqeq2(c0, c1, c2)
  preq1(c0, c2, c1)
}

blocks.name: preq2b
blocks.content: Biconditional equality lemma for unordered pairs, deduction form. Two unordered pairs have the same first element iff the second elements are equal. (Contributed by AV, 18-Dec-2020.)

blocks.name: preqr1
blocks.content: Reverse equality lemma for unordered pairs. If two unordered pairs have the same second element, the first elements are equal. (Contributed by NM, 18-Oct-1995.)

blocks.name: preqr2
blocks.content: Reverse equality lemma for unordered pairs. If two unordered pairs have the same first element, the second elements are equal. (Contributed by NM, 15-Jul-1993.)

blocks.name: preq12b
blocks.content: Equality relationship for two unordered pairs. (Contributed by NM, 17-Oct-1996.)
blocks.origin:
thm preq12b(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wb(wceq(cpr(c0, c1), cpr(c2, c3)), wo(wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)), wa(wceq(c0, c3), wceq(c1, c2))))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
  -| wcel(c2, universe)
  -| wcel(c3, universe)
} = {
  impbii(wceq(cpr(c0, c1), cpr(c2, c3)), wo(wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)), wa(wceq(c0, c3), wceq(c1, c2))))
  mpd(wceq(cpr(c0, c1), cpr(c2, c3)), wo(wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)), wa(wceq(c0, c3), wceq(c1, c2))), wo(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c0, c3)))
  sylib(wceq(cpr(c0, c1), cpr(c2, c3)), wo(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c0, c3)), wcel(c0, cpr(c2, c3)))
  mpbii(wceq(cpr(c0, c1), cpr(c2, c3)), wcel(c0, cpr(c2, c3)), wcel(c0, cpr(c0, c1)))
  prid1(c0, c1)
  eleq2(cpr(c0, c1), cpr(c2, c3), c0)
  elpr(c0, c2, c3)
  orim12d(wceq(cpr(c0, c1), cpr(c2, c3)), wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c0, c3), wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)), wa(wceq(c0, c3), wceq(c1, c2)))
  ancld(wceq(cpr(c0, c1), cpr(c2, c3)), wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3))
  com12(wceq(cpr(c0, c1), cpr(c2, c3)), wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3))
  syl6bi(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(cpr(c0, c1), cpr(c2, c3)), wceq(c1, c3), wceq(cpr(c2, c1), cpr(c2, c3)))
  eqeq1d(cpr(c0, c1), cpr(c2, c3), cpr(c2, c1), wceq(c0, c2))
  preq1(c0, c2, c1)
  preqr2(c2, c1, c3)
  ancld(wceq(cpr(c0, c1), cpr(c2, c3)), wceq(c0, c3), wceq(c1, c2))
  sylbi(wceq(cpr(c0, c1), cpr(c2, c3)), wi(wceq(c0, c3), wceq(c1, c2)), wceq(cpr(c0, c1), cpr(c3, c2)))
  eqeq2i(cpr(c0, c1), cpr(c2, c3), cpr(c3, c2))
  prcom(c2, c3)
  com12(wceq(cpr(c0, c1), cpr(c3, c2)), wceq(c0, c3), wceq(c1, c2))
  syl6bi(wceq(c0, c3), wceq(cpr(c0, c1), cpr(c3, c2)), wceq(c1, c2), wceq(cpr(c3, c1), cpr(c3, c2)))
  eqeq1d(cpr(c0, c1), cpr(c3, c2), cpr(c3, c1), wceq(c0, c3))
  preq1(c0, c3, c1)
  preqr2(c3, c1, c2)
  jaoi(wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c3)), wa(wceq(c0, c3), wceq(c1, c2)), wceq(cpr(c0, c1), cpr(c2, c3)))
  preq12(c0, c2, c1, c3)
  syl6eq(cpr(c0, c1), cpr(c2, c3), cpr(c3, c2), wa(wceq(c0, c3), wceq(c1, c2)))
  preq12(c0, c3, c1, c2)
  prcom(c3, c2)
}

blocks.name: opthpr
blocks.content: An unordered pair has the ordered pair property (compare ~ opth ) under certain conditions. (Contributed by NM, 27-Mar-2007.)
blocks.origin:
thm opthpr(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wne(c0, c1), wb(wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c3, c1)), wa(wceq(c0, c3), wceq(c2, c1))))
  -| wcel(c0, universe)
  -| wcel(c2, universe)
  -| wcel(c3, universe)
  -| wcel(c1, universe)
} = {
  syl5bb(wne(c0, c1), wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c3, c1)), wa(wceq(c0, c3), wceq(c2, c1)), wo(wa(wceq(c0, c3), wceq(c2, c1)), wa(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3))))
  preq12b(c0, c2, c3, c1)
  impbid1(wne(c0, c1), wo(wa(wceq(c0, c3), wceq(c2, c1)), wa(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3))), wa(wceq(c0, c3), wceq(c2, c1)))
  jaod(wne(c0, c1), wa(wceq(c0, c3), wceq(c2, c1)), wa(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3)), wa(wceq(c0, c3), wceq(c2, c1)))
  idd(wne(c0, c1), wa(wceq(c0, c3), wceq(c2, c1)))
  impd(wne(c0, c1), wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3), wa(wceq(c0, c3), wceq(c2, c1)))
  sylbi(wne(c0, c1), wi(wceq(c0, c1), wi(wceq(c2, c3), wa(wceq(c0, c3), wceq(c2, c1)))), wn(wceq(c0, c1)))
  df-ne(c0, c1)
  pm2.21(wceq(c0, c1), wi(wceq(c2, c3), wa(wceq(c0, c3), wceq(c2, c1))))
  orc(wa(wceq(c0, c3), wceq(c2, c1)), wa(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c2, c3)))
}

blocks.name: preqr1g
blocks.content: Reverse equality lemma for unordered pairs. If two unordered pairs have the same second element, the first elements are equal. Closed form of ~ preqr1 . (Contributed by AV, 29-Jan-2021.) (Revised by AV, 18-Sep-2021.)

blocks.name: preq12bg
blocks.content: Closed form of ~ preq12b . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 28-Mar-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm preq12bg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c7))), wb(wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c4, c6)), wo(wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c6)), wa(wceq(c0, c6), wceq(c2, c4)))))
} = {
  impr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c7), wb(wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c4, c6)), wo(wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c6)), wa(wceq(c0, c6), wceq(c2, c4)))))
  3expa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5), wi(wcel(c6, c7), wb(wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c4, c6)), wo(wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c6)), wa(wceq(c0, c6), wceq(c2, c4))))))
  vtocl3ga(hs0, hs1, hs2, c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5, wi(wcel(c6, c7), wb(wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c4, c6)), wo(wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c6)), wa(wceq(c0, c6), wceq(c2, c4))))), wi(wcel(c6, c7), wb(wceq(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cpr(cv(hs2), c6)), wo(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), wceq(cv(hs1), c6)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c6), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))))), wi(wcel(c6, c7), wb(wceq(cpr(c0, cv(hs1)), cpr(cv(hs2), c6)), wo(wa(wceq(c0, cv(hs2)), wceq(cv(hs1), c6)), wa(wceq(c0, c6), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))))), wi(wcel(c6, c7), wb(wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(cv(hs2), c6)), wo(wa(wceq(c0, cv(hs2)), wceq(c2, c6)), wa(wceq(c0, c6), wceq(c2, cv(hs2)))))))
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wcel(c6, c7), wb(wceq(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cpr(cv(hs2), c6)), wo(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), wceq(cv(hs1), c6)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c6), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))), wb(wceq(cpr(c0, cv(hs1)), cpr(cv(hs2), c6)), wo(wa(wceq(c0, cv(hs2)), wceq(cv(hs1), c6)), wa(wceq(c0, c6), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))))
  bibi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cpr(cv(hs2), c6)), wo(wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), wceq(cv(hs1), c6)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c6), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))), wceq(cpr(c0, cv(hs1)), cpr(cv(hs2), c6)), wo(wa(wceq(c0, cv(hs2)), wceq(cv(hs1), c6)), wa(wceq(c0, c6), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))))
  eqeq1d(cpr(cv(hs0), cv(hs1)), cpr(cv(hs2), c6), cpr(c0, cv(hs1)), wceq(cv(hs0), c0))
  preq1(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs1))
  orbi12d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), wceq(cv(hs1), c6)), wa(wceq(cv(hs0), c6), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), wa(wceq(c0, cv(hs2)), wceq(cv(hs1), c6)), wa(wceq(c0, c6), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))
  anbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), cv(hs2)), wceq(cv(hs1), c6), wceq(c0, cv(hs2)))
  eqeq1(cv(hs0), c0, cv(hs2))
  anbi1d(wceq(cv(hs0), c0), wceq(cv(hs0), c6), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)), wceq(c0, c6))
  eqeq1(cv(hs0), c0, c6)
  imbi2d(wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wcel(c6, c7), wb(wceq(cpr(c0, cv(hs1)), cpr(cv(hs2), c6)), wo(wa(wceq(c0, cv(hs2)), wceq(cv(hs1), c6)), wa(wceq(c0, c6), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))))), wb(wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(cv(hs2), c6)), wo(wa(wceq(c0, cv(hs2)), wceq(c2, c6)), wa(wceq(c0, c6), wceq(c2, cv(hs2))))))
  bibi12d(wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wceq(cpr(c0, cv(hs1)), cpr(cv(hs2), c6)), wo(wa(wceq(c0, cv(hs2)), wceq(cv(hs1), c6)), wa(wceq(c0, c6), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2)))), wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(cv(hs2), c6)), wo(wa(wceq(c0, cv(hs2)), wceq(c2, c6)), wa(wceq(c0, c6), wceq(c2, cv(hs2)))))
  eqeq1d(cpr(c0, cv(hs1)), cpr(cv(hs2), c6), cpr(c0, c2), wceq(cv(hs1), c2))
  preq2(cv(hs1), c2, c0)
  orbi12d(wceq(cv(hs1), c2), wa(wceq(c0, cv(hs2)), wceq(cv(hs1), c6)), wa(wceq(c0, c6), wceq(cv(hs1), cv(hs2))), wa(wceq(c0, cv(hs2)), wceq(c2, c6)), wa(wceq(c0, c6), wceq(c2, cv(hs2))))

  ianor(wne(c2, c4), wne(c2, c6))

  syl5bi(w3a(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c7)), wne(c0, c2)), wa(wo(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c0, c6)), wo(wceq(c2, c4), wceq(c2, c6))), wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c4, c6)), wo(wo(wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c4)), wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c6))), wo(wa(wceq(c0, c6), wceq(c2, c4)), wa(wceq(c0, c6), wceq(c2, c6)))))
  anddi(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c0, c6), wceq(c2, c4), wceq(c2, c6))
  3ad2ant3(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c4, c5), wcel(c6, c7)), wne(c0, c2), wi(wo(wo(wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c4)), wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c6))), wo(wa(wceq(c0, c6), wceq(c2, c4)), wa(wceq(c0, c6), wceq(c2, c6)))), wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c4, c6))))
  com12(wne(c0, c2), wo(wo(wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c4)), wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c6))), wo(wa(wceq(c0, c6), wceq(c2, c4)), wa(wceq(c0, c6), wceq(c2, c6)))), wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c4, c6)))

  jaoi(wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c4)), wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c6)), wi(wne(c0, c2), wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c4, c6))))
  syl(wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c4)), wi(wne(c0, c2), wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c4, c6))), wceq(c0, c2))
  eqtr3(c0, c4, c2)

blocks.name: pr1eqbg
blocks.content: A (proper) pair is equal to another (maybe improper) pair containing one element of the first pair if and only if the other element of the first pair is contained in the second pair. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 26-Jan-2018.)
blocks.origin:
thm pr1eqbg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wne(c0, c2)), wb(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c2, c4))))
} = {
  3bitr4d(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wne(c0, c2)), wceq(c0, c4), wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c2, c4)), wo(wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c2, c4)), wceq(c0, c4)), wo(wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c2, c4)), wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c2))))
  a1i(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wne(c0, c2)), wb(wo(wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c2, c4)), wceq(c0, c4)), wo(wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c2, c4)), wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c2)))))
  orbi2i(wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c2, c4)), wceq(c0, c4), wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c2)))
  biantru(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c2))
  eqid(c2)
  syl(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wne(c0, c2)), wb(wceq(c0, c4), wo(wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c2, c4)), wceq(c0, c4))), wn(wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c2, c4))))
  intnanrd(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wne(c0, c2)), wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c2, c4))
  adantl(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wne(c0, c2), wn(wceq(c0, c2)))
  neneq(c0, c2)
  biorf(wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c2, c4)), wceq(c0, c4))
  syl(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wne(c0, c2)), wb(wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c2, c4)), wo(wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c2, c4)), wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c2)))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5))))
  adantr(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wne(c0, c2), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5))))
  jca(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5)))
  3simpa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5))
  3simpc(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c4, c5))
  preq12bg(c0, c1, c2, c3, c2, c3, c4, c5)
}

blocks.name: pr1nebg
blocks.content: A (proper) pair is not equal to another (maybe improper) pair containing one element of the first pair if and only if the other element of the first pair is not contained in the second pair. (Contributed by Alexander van der Vekens, 26-Jan-2018.)

blocks.name: preqsnd
blocks.content: Equivalence for a pair equal to a singleton, deduction form. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 27-Dec-2016.) (Revised by AV, 13-Jun-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm preqsnd(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wb(wceq(cpr(c0, c1), csn(c2)), wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c2))))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c0, universe))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, universe))
} = {
  pm2.61ian(w0, wb(wceq(cpr(c0, c1), csn(c2)), wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c2))), wcel(c2, universe))
  syl22anc(wa(wcel(c2, universe), w0), wb(wceq(cpr(c0, c1), csn(c2)), wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c2))), wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c2, universe))
  adantl(wcel(c2, universe), w0, wcel(c0, universe))
  adantl(wcel(c2, universe), w0, wcel(c1, universe))
  simpl(wcel(c2, universe), w0)
  syl5bb(wa(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wa(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c2, universe))), wceq(cpr(c0, c1), csn(c2)), wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c2)), wceq(cpr(c0, c1), cpr(c2, c2)))
  eqeq2i(cpr(c0, c1), csn(c2), cpr(c2, c2))
  dfsn2(c2)
  syl6bb(wa(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wa(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c2, universe))), wceq(cpr(c0, c1), cpr(c2, c2)), wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c2)), wo(wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c2)), wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c2))))
  preq12bg(c0, universe, c1, universe, c2, universe, c2, universe)
  oridm(wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c2)))
  impbid(wa(wn(wcel(c2, universe)), w0), wceq(cpr(c0, c1), csn(c2)), wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c2)))
  sylbid(wa(wn(wcel(c2, universe)), w0), wceq(cpr(c0, c1), csn(c2)), wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c2)), wceq(cpr(c0, c1), emptycls))
  eqeq2d(cpr(c0, c1), csn(c2), emptycls, wa(wn(wcel(c2, universe)), w0))
  adantr(wn(wcel(c2, universe)), w0, wceq(csn(c2), emptycls))
  biimpi(wn(wcel(c2, universe)), wceq(csn(c2), emptycls))
  snprc(c2)
  adantl(wn(wcel(c2, universe)), w0, wi(wceq(cpr(c0, c1), emptycls), wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c2))))
  syl(w0, wi(wceq(cpr(c0, c1), emptycls), wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c2))), wcel(c0, universe))
  syl5com(wcel(c0, universe), wceq(cpr(c0, c1), emptycls), wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c2)), wne(cpr(c0, c1), emptycls))
  prnzg(c0, universe, c1)
  eqneqall(cpr(c0, c1), emptycls, wa(wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c2)))
  impd(wa(wn(wcel(c2, universe)), w0), wceq(c0, c2), wceq(c1, c2), wceq(cpr(c0, c1), csn(c2)))
  impcom(wn(wcel(c2, universe)), w0, wi(wceq(c0, c2), wi(wceq(c1, c2), wceq(cpr(c0, c1), csn(c2)))))
  syl(w0, wi(wn(wcel(c2, universe)), wi(wceq(c0, c2), wi(wceq(c1, c2), wceq(cpr(c0, c1), csn(c2))))), wcel(c0, universe))
  com13(wcel(c0, universe), wn(wcel(c2, universe)), wceq(c0, c2), wi(wceq(c1, c2), wceq(cpr(c0, c1), csn(c2))))
  syl6bi(wceq(c0, c2), wn(wcel(c2, universe)), wi(wcel(c0, universe), wi(wceq(c1, c2), wceq(cpr(c0, c1), csn(c2)))), wn(wcel(c0, universe)))
  notbid(wceq(c0, c2), wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, universe))
  eqcoms(c0, c2, wb(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, universe)))
  eleq1(c2, c0, universe)
  pm2.21(wcel(c0, universe), wi(wceq(c1, c2), wceq(cpr(c0, c1), csn(c2))))
}
blocks.pretty:
thm preqsnd(class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →({ c0, c1 } = { c2 } ↔(c0 = c2 ∧ c1 = c2)))
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ∈ 𝕌)
} = {
  pm2.61ian(w0, ({ c0, c1 } = { c2 } ↔(c0 = c2 ∧ c1 = c2)), c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  syl22anc((c2 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ w0), ({ c0, c1 } = { c2 } ↔(c0 = c2 ∧ c1 = c2)), c0 ∈ 𝕌, c1 ∈ 𝕌, c2 ∈ 𝕌, c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  adantl(c2 ∈ 𝕌, w0, c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  adantl(c2 ∈ 𝕌, w0, c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  simpl(c2 ∈ 𝕌, w0)
  syl5bb(((c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c1 ∈ 𝕌)∧(c2 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c2 ∈ 𝕌)), { c0, c1 } = { c2 }, (c0 = c2 ∧ c1 = c2), { c0, c1 } = { c2, c2 })
  eqeq2i({ c0, c1 }, { c2 }, { c2, c2 })
  dfsn2(c2)
  syl6bb(((c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c1 ∈ 𝕌)∧(c2 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c2 ∈ 𝕌)), { c0, c1 } = { c2, c2 }, (c0 = c2 ∧ c1 = c2), ((c0 = c2 ∧ c1 = c2)∨(c0 = c2 ∧ c1 = c2)))
  preq12bg(c0, universe, c1, universe, c2, universe, c2, universe)
  oridm((c0 = c2 ∧ c1 = c2))
  impbid((¬ c2 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ w0), { c0, c1 } = { c2 }, (c0 = c2 ∧ c1 = c2))
  sylbid((¬ c2 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ w0), { c0, c1 } = { c2 }, (c0 = c2 ∧ c1 = c2), { c0, c1 } = ∅)
  eqeq2d({ c0, c1 }, { c2 }, emptycls, (¬ c2 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ w0))
  adantr(¬ c2 ∈ 𝕌, w0, { c2 } = ∅)
  biimpi(¬ c2 ∈ 𝕌, { c2 } = ∅)
  snprc(c2)
  adantl(¬ c2 ∈ 𝕌, w0, ({ c0, c1 } = ∅ →(c0 = c2 ∧ c1 = c2)))
  syl(w0, ({ c0, c1 } = ∅ →(c0 = c2 ∧ c1 = c2)), c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  syl5com(c0 ∈ 𝕌, { c0, c1 } = ∅, (c0 = c2 ∧ c1 = c2), { c0, c1 } ≠ ∅)
  prnzg(c0, universe, c1)
  eqneqall({ c0, c1 }, emptycls, (c0 = c2 ∧ c1 = c2))
  impd((¬ c2 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ w0), c0 = c2, c1 = c2, { c0, c1 } = { c2 })
  impcom(¬ c2 ∈ 𝕌, w0, (c0 = c2 →(c1 = c2 → { c0, c1 } = { c2 })))
  syl(w0, (¬ c2 ∈ 𝕌 →(c0 = c2 →(c1 = c2 → { c0, c1 } = { c2 }))), c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  com13(c0 ∈ 𝕌, ¬ c2 ∈ 𝕌, c0 = c2, (c1 = c2 → { c0, c1 } = { c2 }))
  syl6bi(c0 = c2, ¬ c2 ∈ 𝕌, (c0 ∈ 𝕌 →(c1 = c2 → { c0, c1 } = { c2 })), ¬ c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  notbid(c0 = c2, c2 ∈ 𝕌, c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  eqcoms(c0, c2, (c2 ∈ 𝕌 ↔ c0 ∈ 𝕌))
  eleq1(c2, c0, universe)
  pm2.21(c0 ∈ 𝕌, (c1 = c2 → { c0, c1 } = { c2 }))
}

blocks.name: prnesn
blocks.content: A proper unordered pair is not a (proper or improper) singleton. (Contributed by AV, 13-Jun-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm prnesn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2)), wne(cpr(c0, c2), csn(c4)))
} = {
  mpbird(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2)), wne(cpr(c0, c2), csn(c4)), wn(wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c4))))
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2), wn(wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c4))))
  necon3ai(c0, c2, wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c4)))
  eqtr3(c0, c4, c2)
  necon3abid(cpr(c0, c2), csn(c4), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2)), wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c4)))
  preqsnd(c0, c2, c4, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2)))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2), wcel(c0, universe))
  elex(c0, c1)
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2), wcel(c2, universe))
  elex(c2, c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm prnesn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3 ∧ c0 ≠ c2)→ { c0, c2 } ≠ { c4 })
} = {
  mpbird((c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3 ∧ c0 ≠ c2), { c0, c2 } ≠ { c4 }, ¬(c0 = c4 ∧ c2 = c4))
  3ad2ant3(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3, c0 ≠ c2, ¬(c0 = c4 ∧ c2 = c4))
  necon3ai(c0, c2, (c0 = c4 ∧ c2 = c4))
  eqtr3(c0, c4, c2)
  necon3abid({ c0, c2 }, { c4 }, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3 ∧ c0 ≠ c2), (c0 = c4 ∧ c2 = c4))
  preqsnd(c0, c2, c4, (c0 ∈ c1 ∧ c2 ∈ c3 ∧ c0 ≠ c2))
  3ad2ant1(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3, c0 ≠ c2, c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  elex(c0, c1)
  3ad2ant2(c0 ∈ c1, c2 ∈ c3, c0 ≠ c2, c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  elex(c2, c3)
}

thm preq12nebg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2)), wb(wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c4, c5)), wo(wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c5)), wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4)))))
} = {
  pm2.61i(wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2)), wb(wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c4, c5)), wo(wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c5)), wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4))))), wa(wcel(c4, universe), wcel(c5, universe)))
  ex(wa(wcel(c4, universe), wcel(c5, universe)), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2)), wb(wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c4, c5)), wo(wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c5)), wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4)))))
  syl(wa(wa(wcel(c4, universe), wcel(c5, universe)), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2))), wb(wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c4, c5)), wo(wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c5)), wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4)))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c4, universe), wcel(c5, universe))))
  ancoms(wa(wcel(c4, universe), wcel(c5, universe)), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wcel(c4, universe), wcel(c5, universe))))
  anim1i(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2)), wa(wcel(c4, universe), wcel(c5, universe)), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)))
  3simpa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2))
  preq12bg(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, universe, c5, universe)
  sylbi(wn(wa(wcel(c4, universe), wcel(c5, universe))), wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2)), wb(wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c4, c5)), wo(wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c5)), wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4))))), wo(wn(wcel(c4, universe)), wn(wcel(c5, universe))))
  ianor(wcel(c4, universe), wcel(c5, universe))
  ex(wo(wn(wcel(c4, universe)), wn(wcel(c5, universe))), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2)), wb(wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c4, c5)), wo(wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c5)), wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4)))))
  impbid1(wa(wo(wn(wcel(c4, universe)), wn(wcel(c5, universe))), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2))), wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c4, c5)), wo(wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c5)), wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4))))
  jaoian(wn(wcel(c4, universe)), wn(wcel(c5, universe)), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2)), wi(wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c4, c5)), wo(wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c5)), wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4)))))
  syl5com(wa(wn(wcel(c4, universe)), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2))), wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c4, c5)), wo(wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c5)), wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4))), wne(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c4, c5)))
  ancoms(wn(wcel(c4, universe)), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2)), wne(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c4, c5)))
  prneprprc(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5)
  eqneqall(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c4, c5), wo(wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c5)), wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4))))
  syl5com(wa(wn(wcel(c5, universe)), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2))), wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c4, c5)), wo(wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c5)), wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4))), wne(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c5, c4)))
  ancoms(wn(wcel(c5, universe)), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2)), wne(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c5, c4)))
  prneprprc(c0, c1, c2, c3, c5, c4)
  sylbi(wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c4, c5)), wi(wne(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c5, c4)), wo(wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c5)), wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4)))), wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c5, c4)))
  eqeq2i(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c4, c5), cpr(c5, c4))
  prcom(c4, c5)
  eqneqall(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c5, c4), wo(wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c5)), wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4))))
  jaoi(wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c5)), wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4)), wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c4, c5)))
  preq12(c0, c4, c2, c5)
  syl6eq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c4, c5), cpr(c5, c4), wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4)))
  preq12(c0, c5, c2, c4)
  prcom(c5, c4)
}

blocks.name: prel12g
blocks.content: Equality of two unordered pairs. (Contributed by NM, 17-Oct-1996.) (Revised by AV, 9-Dec-2018.) (Revised by AV, 12-Jun-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm prel12g(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2)), wb(wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c4, c5)), wa(wcel(c0, cpr(c4, c5)), wcel(c2, cpr(c4, c5)))))
} = {
  bitrd(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2)), wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c4, c5)), wa(wcel(c0, cpr(c4, c5)), wcel(c2, cpr(c4, c5))), wo(wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c5)), wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4))))
  preq12nebg(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5)
  impbid(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2)), wo(wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c5)), wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4))), wa(wcel(c0, cpr(c4, c5)), wcel(c2, cpr(c4, c5))))
  jaod(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2)), wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c5)), wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4)), wa(wcel(c0, cpr(c4, c5)), wcel(c2, cpr(c4, c5))))
  anim12d(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2)), wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c5), wcel(c0, cpr(c4, c5)), wcel(c2, cpr(c4, c5)))
  ex(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2)), wceq(c0, c4), wcel(c0, cpr(c4, c5)))
  eleqtrd(c0, cpr(c4, c5), cpr(c0, c5), wa(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2)), wceq(c0, c4)))
  adantr(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2)), wceq(c0, c4), wcel(c0, cpr(c0, c5)))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2), wcel(c0, cpr(c0, c5)))
  prid1g(c0, c1, c5)
  adantl(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2)), wceq(c0, c4), wceq(cpr(c0, c5), cpr(c4, c5)))
  preq1(c0, c4, c5)
  syl5ibcom(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2)), wceq(c2, c5), wcel(c2, cpr(c4, c5)), wcel(c2, cpr(c4, c2)))
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2), wcel(c2, cpr(c4, c2)))
  prid2g(c2, c3, c4)
  eleq2d(c2, cpr(c4, c2), cpr(c4, c5), wceq(c2, c5))
  preq2(c2, c5, c4)
  anim12d(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2)), wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4), wcel(c0, cpr(c4, c5)), wcel(c2, cpr(c4, c5)))
  syl5ibcom(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2)), wceq(c0, c5), wcel(c0, cpr(c4, c5)), wcel(c0, cpr(c4, c0)))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2), wcel(c0, cpr(c4, c0)))
  prid2g(c0, c1, c4)
  eleq2d(c0, cpr(c4, c0), cpr(c4, c5), wceq(c0, c5))
  preq2(c0, c5, c4)
  syl5ibcom(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2)), wceq(c2, c4), wcel(c2, cpr(c4, c5)), wcel(c2, cpr(c2, c5)))
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2), wcel(c2, cpr(c2, c5)))
  prid1g(c2, c3, c5)
  eleq2d(c2, cpr(c2, c5), cpr(c4, c5), wceq(c2, c4))
  preq1(c2, c4, c5)
  sylbid(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2)), wa(wcel(c0, cpr(c4, c5)), wcel(c2, cpr(c4, c5))), wo(wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c5)), wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4))), wa(wo(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c0, c5)), wo(wceq(c2, c4), wceq(c2, c5))))
  anbi12d(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2)), wcel(c0, cpr(c4, c5)), wcel(c2, cpr(c4, c5)), wo(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c0, c5)), wo(wceq(c2, c4), wceq(c2, c5)))
  3ad2ant1(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2), wb(wcel(c0, cpr(c4, c5)), wo(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c0, c5))))
  elprg(c0, c1, c4, c5)
  3ad2ant2(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2), wb(wcel(c2, cpr(c4, c5)), wo(wceq(c2, c4), wceq(c2, c5))))
  elprg(c2, c3, c4, c5)
  3ad2ant3(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2), wi(wa(wo(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c0, c5)), wo(wceq(c2, c4), wceq(c2, c5))), wo(wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c5)), wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4)))))
  com12(wne(c0, c2), wa(wo(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c0, c5)), wo(wceq(c2, c4), wceq(c2, c5))), wo(wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c5)), wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4))))
  ccase(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4), wceq(c2, c5), wi(wne(c0, c2), wo(wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c5)), wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4)))))
  syl(wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c4)), wi(wne(c0, c2), wo(wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c5)), wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4)))), wceq(c0, c2))
  eqtr3(c0, c4, c2)
  a1d(wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4)), wne(c0, c2), wo(wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c5)), wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4))))
  olc(wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4)), wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c5)))
  a1d(wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c5)), wne(c0, c2), wo(wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c5)), wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4))))
  orc(wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c5)), wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4)))
  syl(wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c5)), wi(wne(c0, c2), wo(wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c5)), wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4)))), wceq(c0, c2))
  eqtr3(c0, c5, c2)
  eqneqall(c0, c2, wo(wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c5)), wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4))))
}

blocks.name: opthprneg
blocks.content: An unordered pair has the ordered pair property (compare ~ opth ) under certain conditions. Variant of ~ opthpr in closed form. (Contributed by AV, 13-Jun-2022.)
blocks.origin:
thm opthprneg(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wne(c0, c2), wne(c0, c4))), wb(wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c5, c4)), wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4))))
} = {
  pm2.61i(wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wne(c0, c2), wne(c0, c4))), wb(wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c5, c4)), wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4)))), wa(wcel(c5, universe), wcel(c4, universe)))
  expcom(wa(wcel(c5, universe), wcel(c4, universe)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wne(c0, c2), wne(c0, c4))), wb(wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c5, c4)), wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4))))
  bitrd(wa(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wne(c0, c2), wne(c0, c4))), wa(wcel(c5, universe), wcel(c4, universe))), wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c5, c4)), wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4)), wo(wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4)), wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c5))))
  adantlr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wne(c0, c2), wne(c0, c4)), wa(wcel(c5, universe), wcel(c4, universe)), wb(wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c5, c4)), wo(wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4)), wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c5)))))
  preq12bg(c0, c1, c2, c3, c5, universe, c4, universe)
  ad2antlr(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wne(c0, c2), wne(c0, c4)), wa(wcel(c5, universe), wcel(c4, universe)), wb(wo(wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4)), wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c5))), wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4))))
  adantl(wne(c0, c2), wne(c0, c4), wb(wo(wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4)), wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c5))), wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4))))
  impbid1(wne(c0, c4), wo(wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4)), wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c5))), wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4)))
  jaod(wne(c0, c4), wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4)), wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c5)), wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4)))
  idd(wne(c0, c4), wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4)))
  impd(wne(c0, c4), wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c5), wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4)))
  sylbi(wne(c0, c4), wi(wceq(c0, c4), wi(wceq(c2, c5), wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4)))), wn(wceq(c0, c4)))
  df-ne(c0, c4)
  pm2.21(wceq(c0, c4), wi(wceq(c2, c5), wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4))))
  orc(wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4)), wa(wceq(c0, c4), wceq(c2, c5)))
  sylbi(wn(wa(wcel(c5, universe), wcel(c4, universe))), wi(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wne(c0, c2), wne(c0, c4))), wb(wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c5, c4)), wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4)))), wo(wn(wcel(c5, universe)), wn(wcel(c4, universe))))
  ianor(wcel(c5, universe), wcel(c4, universe))
  ex(wo(wn(wcel(c5, universe)), wn(wcel(c4, universe))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wne(c0, c2), wne(c0, c4))), wb(wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c5, c4)), wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4))))
  impbid1(wa(wo(wn(wcel(c5, universe)), wn(wcel(c4, universe))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wne(c0, c2), wne(c0, c4)))), wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c5, c4)), wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4)))
  jaoian(wn(wcel(c5, universe)), wn(wcel(c4, universe)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wne(c0, c2), wne(c0, c4))), wi(wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c5, c4)), wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4))))
  syl5com(wa(wn(wcel(c5, universe)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wne(c0, c2), wne(c0, c4)))), wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c5, c4)), wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4)), wne(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c5, c4)))
  ancoms(wn(wcel(c5, universe)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wne(c0, c2), wne(c0, c4))), wne(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c5, c4)))
  sylan(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wne(c0, c2), wne(c0, c4))), wn(wcel(c5, universe)), wne(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c5, c4)), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2)))
  prneprprc(c0, c1, c2, c3, c5, c4)
  eqneqall(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c5, c4), wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4)))
  syl5com(wa(wn(wcel(c4, universe)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wne(c0, c2), wne(c0, c4)))), wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c5, c4)), wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4)), wne(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c4, c5)))
  ancoms(wn(wcel(c4, universe)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wne(c0, c2), wne(c0, c4))), wne(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c4, c5)))
  sylan(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wne(c0, c2), wne(c0, c4))), wn(wcel(c4, universe)), wne(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c4, c5)), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2)))
  sylibr(wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wne(c0, c2), wne(c0, c4))), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wne(c0, c2)))
  anim2i(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3)), wa(wne(c0, c2), wne(c0, c4)), wne(c0, c2))
  simpl(wne(c0, c2), wne(c0, c4))
  df-3an(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c0, c2))
  prneprprc(c0, c1, c2, c3, c4, c5)
  sylbi(wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c5, c4)), wi(wne(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c4, c5)), wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4))), wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c4, c5)))
  eqeq2i(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c5, c4), cpr(c4, c5))
  prcom(c5, c4)
  eqneqall(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c4, c5), wa(wceq(c0, c5), wceq(c2, c4)))
  preq12(c0, c5, c2, c4)
}

blocks.name: elpreqprlem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ elpreqpr . (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 7-Dec-2020.) (Revised by AV, 9-Dec-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm elpreqprlem(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wex(s0, wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c0, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  pm2.61i(wi(wcel(c0, c1), wex(s0, wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c0, cv(s0))))), wcel(c2, universe))
  a1d(wcel(c2, universe), wcel(c0, c1), wex(s0, wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c0, cv(s0)))))
  mpi(wcel(c2, universe), wex(s0, wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c0, cv(s0)))), wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c0, c2)))
  eqid(cpr(c0, c2))
  spcegv(s0, c2, universe, wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c0, c2)), wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c0, cv(s0))))
  eqeq2d(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c0, cv(s0)), cpr(c0, c2), wceq(cv(s0), c2))
  preq2(cv(s0), c2, c0)
  syl5ibr(wn(wcel(c2, universe)), wcel(c0, c1), wex(s0, wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c0, cv(s0)))), wex(s0, wceq(csn(c0), cpr(c0, cv(s0)))))
  mpi(wcel(c0, c1), wex(s0, wceq(csn(c0), cpr(c0, cv(s0)))), wceq(csn(c0), cpr(c0, c0)))
  dfsn2(c0)
  spcegv(s0, c0, c1, wceq(csn(c0), cpr(c0, c0)), wceq(csn(c0), cpr(c0, cv(s0))))
  eqeq2d(csn(c0), cpr(c0, cv(s0)), cpr(c0, c0), wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  preq2(cv(s0), c0, c0)
  exbidv(s0, wn(wcel(c2, universe)), wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c0, cv(s0))), wceq(csn(c0), cpr(c0, cv(s0))))
  eqeq1d(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c0, cv(s0)), csn(c0), wn(wcel(c2, universe)))
  prprc2(c2, c0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c0, c2))
  diff.cpr.s(s0, c0, c2)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, csn(c0), cpr(c0, c0))
  diff.csn.s(s0, c0)
  diff.cpr.s(s0, c0, c0)
  diff.wn.s(s0, wcel(c2, universe))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elpreqprlem(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 → ∃(s0, { c0, c2 } = { c0, s0 }))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  pm2.61i((c0 ∈ c1 → ∃(s0, { c0, c2 } = { c0, s0 })), c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  a1d(c2 ∈ 𝕌, c0 ∈ c1, ∃(s0, { c0, c2 } = { c0, s0 }))
  mpi(c2 ∈ 𝕌, ∃(s0, { c0, c2 } = { c0, s0 }), { c0, c2 } = { c0, c2 })
  eqid({ c0, c2 })
  spcegv(s0, c2, universe, { c0, c2 } = { c0, c2 }, { c0, c2 } = { c0, s0 })
  eqeq2d({ c0, c2 }, { c0, s0 }, { c0, c2 }, s0 = c2)
  preq2(s0, c2, c0)
  syl5ibr(¬ c2 ∈ 𝕌, c0 ∈ c1, ∃(s0, { c0, c2 } = { c0, s0 }), ∃(s0, { c0 } = { c0, s0 }))
  mpi(c0 ∈ c1, ∃(s0, { c0 } = { c0, s0 }), { c0 } = { c0, c0 })
  dfsn2(c0)
  spcegv(s0, c0, c1, { c0 } = { c0, c0 }, { c0 } = { c0, s0 })
  eqeq2d({ c0 }, { c0, s0 }, { c0, c0 }, s0 = c0)
  preq2(s0, c0, c0)
  exbidv(s0, ¬ c2 ∈ 𝕌, { c0, c2 } = { c0, s0 }, { c0 } = { c0, s0 })
  eqeq1d({ c0, c2 }, { c0, s0 }, { c0 }, ¬ c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  prprc2(c2, c0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, { c0, c2 }, { c0, c2 })
  diff.cpr.s(s0, c0, c2)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, { c0 }, { c0, c0 })
  diff.csn.s(s0, c0)
  diff.cpr.s(s0, c0, c0)
  diff.wn.s(s0, c2 ∈ 𝕌)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, universe)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: elpreqpr
blocks.content: Equality and membership rule for pairs. (Contributed by Scott Fenton, 7-Dec-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm elpreqpr(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cpr(c1, c2)), wex(s0, wceq(cpr(c1, c2), cpr(c0, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  syl2anc(wcel(c0, cpr(c1, c2)), wex(s0, wceq(cpr(c1, c2), cpr(c0, cv(s0)))), wo(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c0, c2)), wcel(c0, universe))
  elpri(c0, c1, c2)
  elex(c0, cpr(c1, c2))
  jaoian(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c0, c2), wcel(c0, universe), wex(s0, wceq(cpr(c1, c2), cpr(c0, cv(s0)))))
  imp(wceq(c0, c1), wcel(c0, universe), wex(s0, wceq(cpr(c1, c2), cpr(c0, cv(s0)))))
  mpbiri(wceq(c0, c1), wi(wcel(c0, universe), wex(s0, wceq(cpr(c1, c2), cpr(c0, cv(s0))))), wi(wcel(c1, universe), wex(s0, wceq(cpr(c1, c2), cpr(c1, cv(s0))))))
  elpreqprlem(s0, c1, universe, c2)
  imbi12d(wceq(c0, c1), wcel(c0, universe), wex(s0, wceq(cpr(c1, c2), cpr(c0, cv(s0)))), wcel(c1, universe), wex(s0, wceq(cpr(c1, c2), cpr(c1, cv(s0)))))
  eleq1(c0, c1, universe)
  exbidv(s0, wceq(c0, c1), wceq(cpr(c1, c2), cpr(c0, cv(s0))), wceq(cpr(c1, c2), cpr(c1, cv(s0))))
  eqeq2d(cpr(c1, c2), cpr(c0, cv(s0)), cpr(c1, cv(s0)), wceq(c0, c1))
  preq1(c0, c1, cv(s0))
  imp(wceq(c0, c2), wcel(c0, universe), wex(s0, wceq(cpr(c1, c2), cpr(c0, cv(s0)))))
  mpbiri(wceq(c0, c2), wi(wcel(c0, universe), wex(s0, wceq(cpr(c1, c2), cpr(c0, cv(s0))))), wi(wcel(c2, universe), wex(s0, wceq(cpr(c1, c2), cpr(c2, cv(s0))))))
  sylib(wcel(c2, universe), wex(s0, wceq(cpr(c1, c2), cpr(c2, cv(s0)))), wex(s0, wceq(cpr(c2, c1), cpr(c2, cv(s0)))))
  elpreqprlem(s0, c2, universe, c1)
  exbii(s0, wceq(cpr(c2, c1), cpr(c2, cv(s0))), wceq(cpr(c1, c2), cpr(c2, cv(s0))))
  eqeq1i(cpr(c2, c1), cpr(c2, cv(s0)), cpr(c1, c2))
  prcom(c2, c1)
  imbi12d(wceq(c0, c2), wcel(c0, universe), wex(s0, wceq(cpr(c1, c2), cpr(c0, cv(s0)))), wcel(c2, universe), wex(s0, wceq(cpr(c1, c2), cpr(c2, cv(s0)))))
  eleq1(c0, c2, universe)
  exbidv(s0, wceq(c0, c2), wceq(cpr(c1, c2), cpr(c0, cv(s0))), wceq(cpr(c1, c2), cpr(c2, cv(s0))))
  eqeq2d(cpr(c1, c2), cpr(c0, cv(s0)), cpr(c2, cv(s0)), wceq(c0, c2))
  preq1(c0, c2, cv(s0))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c0, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elpreqpr(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ { c1, c2 } → ∃(s0, { c1, c2 } = { c0, s0 }))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
} = {
  syl2anc(c0 ∈ { c1, c2 }, ∃(s0, { c1, c2 } = { c0, s0 }), (c0 = c1 ∨ c0 = c2), c0 ∈ 𝕌)
  elpri(c0, c1, c2)
  elex(c0, { c1, c2 })
  jaoian(c0 = c1, c0 = c2, c0 ∈ 𝕌, ∃(s0, { c1, c2 } = { c0, s0 }))
  imp(c0 = c1, c0 ∈ 𝕌, ∃(s0, { c1, c2 } = { c0, s0 }))
  mpbiri(c0 = c1, (c0 ∈ 𝕌 → ∃(s0, { c1, c2 } = { c0, s0 })), (c1 ∈ 𝕌 → ∃(s0, { c1, c2 } = { c1, s0 })))
  elpreqprlem(s0, c1, universe, c2)
  imbi12d(c0 = c1, c0 ∈ 𝕌, ∃(s0, { c1, c2 } = { c0, s0 }), c1 ∈ 𝕌, ∃(s0, { c1, c2 } = { c1, s0 }))
  eleq1(c0, c1, universe)
  exbidv(s0, c0 = c1, { c1, c2 } = { c0, s0 }, { c1, c2 } = { c1, s0 })
  eqeq2d({ c1, c2 }, { c0, s0 }, { c1, s0 }, c0 = c1)
  preq1(c0, c1, s0)
  imp(c0 = c2, c0 ∈ 𝕌, ∃(s0, { c1, c2 } = { c0, s0 }))
  mpbiri(c0 = c2, (c0 ∈ 𝕌 → ∃(s0, { c1, c2 } = { c0, s0 })), (c2 ∈ 𝕌 → ∃(s0, { c1, c2 } = { c2, s0 })))
  sylib(c2 ∈ 𝕌, ∃(s0, { c1, c2 } = { c2, s0 }), ∃(s0, { c2, c1 } = { c2, s0 }))
  elpreqprlem(s0, c2, universe, c1)
  exbii(s0, { c2, c1 } = { c2, s0 }, { c1, c2 } = { c2, s0 })
  eqeq1i({ c2, c1 }, { c2, s0 }, { c1, c2 })
  prcom(c2, c1)
  imbi12d(c0 = c2, c0 ∈ 𝕌, ∃(s0, { c1, c2 } = { c0, s0 }), c2 ∈ 𝕌, ∃(s0, { c1, c2 } = { c2, s0 }))
  eleq1(c0, c2, universe)
  exbidv(s0, c0 = c2, { c1, c2 } = { c0, s0 }, { c1, c2 } = { c2, s0 })
  eqeq2d({ c1, c2 }, { c0, s0 }, { c2, s0 }, c0 = c2)
  preq1(c0, c2, s0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c0, c2)
}

blocks.name: elpreqprb
blocks.content: A set is an element of an unordered pair iff there is another (maybe the same) set which is an element of the unordered pair. (Proposed by BJ, 8-Dec-2020.) (Contributed by AV, 9-Dec-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm elpreqprb(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, c1), wb(wcel(c0, cpr(c2, c3)), wex(s0, wceq(cpr(c2, c3), cpr(c0, cv(s0))))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  impbid2(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c0, cpr(c2, c3)), wex(s0, wceq(cpr(c2, c3), cpr(c0, cv(s0)))))
  elpreqpr(s0, c0, c2, c3)
  exlimdv(s0, wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cpr(c2, c3), cpr(c0, cv(s0))), wcel(c0, cpr(c2, c3)))
  syl5ibrcom(wcel(c0, c1), wceq(cpr(c2, c3), cpr(c0, cv(s0))), wcel(c0, cpr(c2, c3)), wcel(c0, cpr(c0, cv(s0))))
  prid1g(c0, c1, cv(s0))
  eleq2(cpr(c2, c3), cpr(c0, cv(s0)), c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, cpr(c2, c3))
  diff.cpr.s(s0, c2, c3)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm elpreqprb(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ (c0 ∈ c1 →(c0 ∈ { c2, c3 } ↔ ∃(s0, { c2, c3 } = { c0, s0 })))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  impbid2(c0 ∈ c1, c0 ∈ { c2, c3 }, ∃(s0, { c2, c3 } = { c0, s0 }))
  elpreqpr(s0, c0, c2, c3)
  exlimdv(s0, c0 ∈ c1, { c2, c3 } = { c0, s0 }, c0 ∈ { c2, c3 })
  syl5ibrcom(c0 ∈ c1, { c2, c3 } = { c0, s0 }, c0 ∈ { c2, c3 }, c0 ∈ { c0, s0 })
  prid1g(c0, c1, s0)
  eleq2({ c2, c3 }, { c0, s0 }, c0)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, { c2, c3 })
  diff.cpr.s(s0, c2, c3)
}

blocks.name: elpr2elpr
blocks.content: For an element ` A ` of an unordered pair which is a subset of a given set ` V ` , there is another (maybe the same) element ` b ` of the given set ` V ` being an element of the unordered pair. (Contributed by AV, 5-Dec-2020.)
blocks.origin:
thm elpr2elpr(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, cpr(c0, c2))), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c3, cv(s0)))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  3impia(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1), wcel(c3, cpr(c0, c2)), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c3, cv(s0)))))
  syl11(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wcel(c3, cpr(c0, c2)), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c3, cv(s0)))), wo(wceq(c3, c0), wceq(c3, c2)))
  jaoi(wceq(c3, c0), wceq(c3, c2), wi(wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c3, cv(s0))))))
  ex(wceq(c3, c0), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c3, cv(s0)))))
  rspcedvd(s0, c1, c2, wa(wceq(c3, c0), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1))), wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c3, cv(s0))), wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c3, c2)))
  simprr(wceq(c3, c0), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1))
  adantl(wa(wceq(c3, c0), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1))), wceq(cv(s0), c2), wb(wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c3, cv(s0))), wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c3, c2))))
  eqeq2d(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c3, cv(s0)), cpr(c3, c2), wceq(cv(s0), c2))
  preq2(cv(s0), c2, c3)
  adantr(wceq(c3, c0), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c3, c2)))
  eqcoms(c3, c0, wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c3, c2)))
  preq1(c0, c3, c2)
  ex(wceq(c3, c2), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wrex(s0, c1, wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c3, cv(s0)))))
  rspcedvd(s0, c1, c0, wa(wceq(c3, c2), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1))), wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c3, cv(s0))), wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c3, c0)))
  simprl(wceq(c3, c2), wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1))
  adantl(wa(wceq(c3, c2), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1))), wceq(cv(s0), c0), wb(wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c3, cv(s0))), wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c3, c0))))
  eqeq2d(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c3, cv(s0)), cpr(c3, c0), wceq(cv(s0), c0))
  preq2(cv(s0), c0, c3)
  adantr(wceq(c3, c2), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)), wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c3, c0)))
  syl6eq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c3, c0), cpr(c0, c3), wceq(c3, c2))
  eqcoms(c3, c2, wceq(cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c0, c3)))
  preq2(c2, c3, c0)
  prcom(c0, c3)
  elpri(c3, c0, c2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wceq(c3, c0), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c3, c0)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c3, c2))
  diff.cpr.s(s0, c3, c2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wceq(c3, c2), wa(wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c3, c2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c0, c1), wcel(c2, c1))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, c1)
  diff.wceq.s(s0, cpr(c0, c2), cpr(c3, c0))
  diff.cpr.s(s0, c0, c2)
  diff.cpr.s(s0, c3, c0)
}

blocks.name: dfopif
blocks.content: Rewrite ~ df-op using ` if ` . When both arguments are sets, it reduces to the standard Kuratowski definition; otherwise, it is defined to be the empty set. Avoid directly depending on this detail so that theorems will not depend on the Kuratowski construction. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 26-Apr-2015.) (Avoid depending on this detail.)
blocks.origin:
thm dfopif(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(cop(c0, c1), cif(cpr(csn(c0), cpr(c0, c1)), emptycls, wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))))
} = {
  3eqtri(cop(c0, c1), cif(cpr(csn(c0), cpr(c0, c1)), emptycls, wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))), cab(hs0, w3a(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(cv(hs0), cpr(csn(c0), cpr(c0, c1))))), cab(hs0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wcel(cv(hs0), cpr(csn(c0), cpr(c0, c1))))))
  df-op(hs0, c0, c1)
  abbii(hs0, w3a(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(cv(hs0), cpr(csn(c0), cpr(c0, c1)))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wcel(cv(hs0), cpr(csn(c0), cpr(c0, c1)))))
  df-3an(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe), wcel(cv(hs0), cpr(csn(c0), cpr(c0, c1))))
  pm2.61i(wceq(cab(hs0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wcel(cv(hs0), cpr(csn(c0), cpr(c0, c1))))), cif(cpr(csn(c0), cpr(c0, c1)), emptycls, wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)))), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)))
  eqtr2d(cab(hs0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wcel(cv(hs0), cpr(csn(c0), cpr(c0, c1))))), cif(cpr(csn(c0), cpr(c0, c1)), emptycls, wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))), cpr(csn(c0), cpr(c0, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)))
  iftrue(cpr(csn(c0), cpr(c0, c1)), emptycls, wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)))
  abbi2dv(hs0, cpr(csn(c0), cpr(c0, c1)), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wcel(cv(hs0), cpr(csn(c0), cpr(c0, c1)))))
  ibar(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wcel(cv(hs0), cpr(csn(c0), cpr(c0, c1))))
  eqtr4d(cab(hs0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wcel(cv(hs0), cpr(csn(c0), cpr(c0, c1))))), cif(cpr(csn(c0), cpr(c0, c1)), emptycls, wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))), emptycls, wn(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))))
  syl(wn(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))), wceq(cab(hs0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wcel(cv(hs0), cpr(csn(c0), cpr(c0, c1))))), emptycls), wss(cab(hs0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wcel(cv(hs0), cpr(csn(c0), cpr(c0, c1))))), emptycls))
  abssdv(hs0, emptycls, wn(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))), wa(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wcel(cv(hs0), cpr(csn(c0), cpr(c0, c1)))))
  adantrd(wn(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))), wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wcel(cv(hs0), cpr(csn(c0), cpr(c0, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  pm2.21(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wcel(cv(hs0), emptycls))
  ss0(cab(hs0, wa(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)), wcel(cv(hs0), cpr(csn(c0), cpr(c0, c1))))))
  iffalse(cpr(csn(c0), cpr(c0, c1)), emptycls, wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c(cpr(csn(c0), cpr(c0, c1)))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)))
  diff.hs0.c(emptycls)
  diff.hs0.w(wn(wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))))

blocks.name: nfop
blocks.content: Bound-variable hypothesis builder for ordered pairs. (Contributed by NM, 14-Nov-1995.)
blocks.origin:
thm nfop(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wnfc(s0, cop(c0, c1))
  -| wnfc(s0, c0)
  -| wnfc(s0, c1)
} = {
  nfcxfr(s0, cop(c0, c1), cif(cpr(csn(c0), cpr(c0, c1)), emptycls, wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))))
  dfopif(c0, c1)
  nfif(s0, cpr(csn(c0), cpr(c0, c1)), emptycls, wa(wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe)))
  nfan(s0, wcel(c0, universe), wcel(c1, universe))
  nfel1(s0, c0, universe)
  nfel1(s0, c1, universe)
  nfpr(s0, csn(c0), cpr(c0, c1))
  nfsn(s0, c0)
  nfpr(s0, c0, c1)
  nfcv(s0, emptycls)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nfop(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  ⊢ F/(s0, < c0, c1 >)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c0)
  ⊣ F/(s0, c1)
} = {
  nfcxfr(s0, < c0, c1 >, if((c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c1 ∈ 𝕌), { { c0 }, { c0, c1 } }, ∅))
  dfopif(c0, c1)
  nfif(s0, { { c0 }, { c0, c1 } }, emptycls, (c0 ∈ 𝕌 ∧ c1 ∈ 𝕌))
  nfan(s0, c0 ∈ 𝕌, c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  nfel1(s0, c0, universe)
  nfel1(s0, c1, universe)
  nfpr(s0, { c0 }, { c0, c1 })
  nfsn(s0, c0)
  nfpr(s0, c0, c1)
  nfcv(s0, emptycls)
  diff.universe.s(s0)
  diff.emptycls.s(s0)
}

blocks.name: nfopd
blocks.content: Deduction version of bound-variable hypothesis builder ~ nfop . This shows how the deduction version of a not-free theorem such as ~ nfop can be created from the corresponding not-free inference theorem. (Contributed by NM, 4-Feb-2008.)
blocks.origin:
thm nfopd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wnfc(s0, cop(c0, c1)))
  -| wi(w0, wnfc(s0, c0))
  -| wi(w0, wnfc(s0, c1))
} = {
  mpbii(w0, wnfc(s0, cop(c0, c1)), wnfc(s0, cop(cab(hs0, wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))), cab(hs0, wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))))))
  nfop(s0, cab(hs0, wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))), cab(hs0, wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))))
  nfaba1(s0, hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))
  nfaba1(s0, hs0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))
  syl2anc(w0, wb(wnfc(s0, cop(cab(hs0, wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))), cab(hs0, wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))))), wnfc(s0, cop(c0, c1))), wnfc(s0, c0), wnfc(s0, c1))
  nfceqdf(s0, cop(cab(hs0, wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))), cab(hs0, wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1)))), cop(c0, c1), wa(wnfc(s0, c0), wnfc(s0, c1)))
  nfan(s0, wnfc(s0, c0), wnfc(s0, c1))
  nfnfc1(s0, c0)
  nfnfc1(s0, c1)
  opeq12d(cab(hs0, wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))), cab(hs0, wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), c0, c1, wa(wnfc(s0, c0), wnfc(s0, c1)))
  adantr(wnfc(s0, c0), wnfc(s0, c1), wceq(cab(hs0, wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c0))), c0))
  abidnf(s0, hs0, c0)
  adantl(wnfc(s0, c0), wnfc(s0, c1), wceq(cab(hs0, wal(s0, wcel(cv(hs0), c1))), c1))
  abidnf(s0, hs0, c1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm nfopd(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → F/(s0, < c0, c1 >))
  ⊣ (w0 → F/(s0, c0))
  ⊣ (w0 → F/(s0, c1))
} = {
  mpbii(w0, F/(s0, < c0, c1 >), F/(s0, < { hs0 | ∀(s0, hs0 ∈ c0)}, { hs0 | ∀(s0, hs0 ∈ c1)} >))
  nfop(s0, { hs0 | ∀(s0, hs0 ∈ c0)}, { hs0 | ∀(s0, hs0 ∈ c1)})
  nfaba1(s0, hs0, hs0 ∈ c0)
  nfaba1(s0, hs0, hs0 ∈ c1)
  syl2anc(w0, (F/(s0, < { hs0 | ∀(s0, hs0 ∈ c0)}, { hs0 | ∀(s0, hs0 ∈ c1)} >)↔ F/(s0, < c0, c1 >)), F/(s0, c0), F/(s0, c1))
  nfceqdf(s0, < { hs0 | ∀(s0, hs0 ∈ c0)}, { hs0 | ∀(s0, hs0 ∈ c1)} >, < c0, c1 >, (F/(s0, c0)∧ F/(s0, c1)))
  nfan(s0, F/(s0, c0), F/(s0, c1))
  nfnfc1(s0, c0)
  nfnfc1(s0, c1)
  opeq12d({ hs0 | ∀(s0, hs0 ∈ c0)}, { hs0 | ∀(s0, hs0 ∈ c1)}, c0, c1, (F/(s0, c0)∧ F/(s0, c1)))
  adantr(F/(s0, c0), F/(s0, c1), { hs0 | ∀(s0, hs0 ∈ c0)} = c0)
  abidnf(s0, hs0, c0)
  adantl(F/(s0, c0), F/(s0, c1), { hs0 | ∀(s0, hs0 ∈ c1)} = c1)
  abidnf(s0, hs0, c1)
  diffss.ex(s0, hs0)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
}

thm pwsnALT(class c0) {
  ⊢ P({ c0 })= { ∅, { c0 } }
} = {
  3eqtr4i(P({ c0 }), { ∅, { c0 } }, { hs0 | hs0 ⊆ { c0 } }, { hs0 |(hs0 = ∅ ∨ hs0 = { c0 })})
  abbii(hs0, hs0 ⊆ { c0 }, (hs0 = ∅ ∨ hs0 = { c0 }))
  impbii(hs0 ⊆ { c0 }, (hs0 = ∅ ∨ hs0 = { c0 }))

  anc2li(hs0 ⊆ { c0 }, ¬ hs0 = ∅, { c0 } ⊆ hs0)

  bitri(hs0 ⊆ { c0 }, ∀(hs1,(hs1 ∈ hs0 → hs1 = c0)), ∀(hs1,(hs1 ∈ hs0 → hs1 ∈ { c0 })))
  dfss2(hs1, hs0, { c0 })
  albii(hs1, (hs1 ∈ hs0 → hs1 ∈ { c0 }), (hs1 ∈ hs0 → hs1 = c0))
  imbi2i(hs1 ∈ hs0, hs1 ∈ { c0 }, hs1 = c0)
  velsn(hs1, c0)
  syl6(∀(hs1,(hs1 ∈ hs0 → hs1 = c0)), ¬ hs0 = ∅, { c0 } ⊆ hs0, ∃(hs1,(hs1 ∈ hs0 ∧ hs1 = c0)))
  syl5bi(∀(hs1,(hs1 ∈ hs0 → hs1 = c0)), ¬ hs0 = ∅, ∃(hs1,(hs1 ∈ hs0 ∧ hs1 = c0)), ∃(hs1, hs1 ∈ hs0))
  neq0(hs1, hs0)
  exintr(hs1, hs1 ∈ hs0, hs1 = c0)
  sylbi(∃(hs1,(hs1 ∈ hs0 ∧ hs1 = c0)), { c0 } ⊆ hs0, c0 ∈ hs0)
  bitr2i(∃(hs1,(hs1 ∈ hs0 ∧ hs1 = c0)), c0 ∈ hs0, ∃(hs1,(hs1 = c0 ∧ hs1 ∈ hs0)))
  df-clel(hs1, c0, hs0)
  exancom(hs1, hs1 = c0, hs1 ∈ hs0)
  snssi(c0, hs0)
  eqss(hs0, { c0 })
  jaoi(hs0 = ∅, hs0 = { c0 }, hs0 ⊆ { c0 })
  mpbiri(hs0 = ∅, hs0 ⊆ { c0 }, ∅ ⊆ { c0 })
  0ss({ c0 })
  sseq1(hs0, emptycls, { c0 })
  eqimss(hs0, { c0 })
  df-pw(hs0, { c0 })
  dfpr2(hs0, emptycls, { c0 })
  diff.hs1.c(hs0)
  diff.hs1.c({ c0 })
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c({ c0 })
  diff.hs0.c(emptycls)
}

blocks.name: pwpr
blocks.content: The power set of an unordered pair. (Contributed by NM, 1-May-2009.)
blocks.origin:
thm pwpr(class c0, class c1) {
  |- wceq(cpw(cpr(c0, c1)), cun(cpr(emptycls, csn(c0)), cpr(csn(c1), cpr(c0, c1))))
} = {
  eqriv(hs0, cpw(cpr(c0, c1)), cun(cpr(emptycls, csn(c0)), cpr(csn(c1), cpr(c0, c1))))
  3bitr4i(wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(cpr(c0, c1))), wcel(cv(hs0), cun(cpr(emptycls, csn(c0)), cpr(csn(c1), cpr(c0, c1)))), wss(cv(hs0), cpr(c0, c1)), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), cpr(emptycls, csn(c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cpr(csn(c1), cpr(c0, c1)))))
  bitr4i(wss(cv(hs0), cpr(c0, c1)), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), cpr(emptycls, csn(c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cpr(csn(c1), cpr(c0, c1)))), wo(wo(wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls), wceq(cv(hs0), csn(c0))), wo(wceq(cv(hs0), csn(c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cpr(c0, c1)))))
  sspr(cv(hs0), c0, c1)
  orbi12i(wcel(cv(hs0), cpr(emptycls, csn(c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cpr(csn(c1), cpr(c0, c1))), wo(wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls), wceq(cv(hs0), csn(c0))), wo(wceq(cv(hs0), csn(c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cpr(c0, c1))))
  elpr(cv(hs0), emptycls, csn(c0))
  elpr(cv(hs0), csn(c1), cpr(c0, c1))
  vex(hs0)
  selpw(hs0, cpr(c0, c1))
  elun(cv(hs0), cpr(emptycls, csn(c0)), cpr(csn(c1), cpr(c0, c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(cpr(c0, c1)))
  diff.hs0.c(cun(cpr(emptycls, csn(c0)), cpr(csn(c1), cpr(c0, c1))))
  diff.hs0.c(cpr(c0, c1))
}

blocks.name: pwtp
blocks.content: The power set of an unordered triple. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Jul-2016.)
blocks.origin:
thm pwtp(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wceq(cpw(ctp(c0, c1, c2)), cun(cun(cpr(emptycls, csn(c0)), cpr(csn(c1), cpr(c0, c1))), cun(cpr(csn(c2), cpr(c0, c2)), cpr(cpr(c1, c2), ctp(c0, c1, c2)))))
} = {
  eqriv(hs0, cpw(ctp(c0, c1, c2)), cun(cun(cpr(emptycls, csn(c0)), cpr(csn(c1), cpr(c0, c1))), cun(cpr(csn(c2), cpr(c0, c2)), cpr(cpr(c1, c2), ctp(c0, c1, c2)))))
  bitri(wcel(cv(hs0), cpw(ctp(c0, c1, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cun(cun(cpr(emptycls, csn(c0)), cpr(csn(c1), cpr(c0, c1))), cun(cpr(csn(c2), cpr(c0, c2)), cpr(cpr(c1, c2), ctp(c0, c1, c2))))), wss(cv(hs0), ctp(c0, c1, c2)))
  selpw(hs0, ctp(c0, c1, c2))
  3bitr4ri(wss(cv(hs0), ctp(c0, c1, c2)), wcel(cv(hs0), cun(cun(cpr(emptycls, csn(c0)), cpr(csn(c1), cpr(c0, c1))), cun(cpr(csn(c2), cpr(c0, c2)), cpr(cpr(c1, c2), ctp(c0, c1, c2))))), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), cun(cpr(emptycls, csn(c0)), cpr(csn(c1), cpr(c0, c1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cun(cpr(csn(c2), cpr(c0, c2)), cpr(cpr(c1, c2), ctp(c0, c1, c2))))), wo(wo(wo(wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls), wceq(cv(hs0), csn(c0))), wo(wceq(cv(hs0), csn(c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cpr(c0, c1)))), wo(wo(wceq(cv(hs0), csn(c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), cpr(c0, c2))), wo(wceq(cv(hs0), cpr(c1, c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), ctp(c0, c1, c2))))))
  orbi12i(wcel(cv(hs0), cun(cpr(emptycls, csn(c0)), cpr(csn(c1), cpr(c0, c1)))), wcel(cv(hs0), cun(cpr(csn(c2), cpr(c0, c2)), cpr(cpr(c1, c2), ctp(c0, c1, c2)))), wo(wo(wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls), wceq(cv(hs0), csn(c0))), wo(wceq(cv(hs0), csn(c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cpr(c0, c1)))), wo(wo(wceq(cv(hs0), csn(c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), cpr(c0, c2))), wo(wceq(cv(hs0), cpr(c1, c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), ctp(c0, c1, c2)))))
  bitri(wcel(cv(hs0), cun(cpr(emptycls, csn(c0)), cpr(csn(c1), cpr(c0, c1)))), wo(wo(wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls), wceq(cv(hs0), csn(c0))), wo(wceq(cv(hs0), csn(c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cpr(c0, c1)))), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), cpr(emptycls, csn(c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cpr(csn(c1), cpr(c0, c1)))))
  elun(cv(hs0), cpr(emptycls, csn(c0)), cpr(csn(c1), cpr(c0, c1)))
  orbi12i(wcel(cv(hs0), cpr(emptycls, csn(c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), cpr(csn(c1), cpr(c0, c1))), wo(wceq(cv(hs0), emptycls), wceq(cv(hs0), csn(c0))), wo(wceq(cv(hs0), csn(c1)), wceq(cv(hs0), cpr(c0, c1))))
  elpr(cv(hs0), emptycls, csn(c0))
  elpr(cv(hs0), csn(c1), cpr(c0, c1))
  bitri(wcel(cv(hs0), cun(cpr(csn(c2), cpr(c0, c2)), cpr(cpr(c1, c2), ctp(c0, c1, c2)))), wo(wo(wceq(cv(hs0), csn(c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), cpr(c0, c2))), wo(wceq(cv(hs0), cpr(c1, c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), ctp(c0, c1, c2)))), wo(wcel(cv(hs0), cpr(csn(c2), cpr(c0, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cpr(cpr(c1, c2), ctp(c0, c1, c2)))))
  elun(cv(hs0), cpr(csn(c2), cpr(c0, c2)), cpr(cpr(c1, c2), ctp(c0, c1, c2)))
  orbi12i(wcel(cv(hs0), cpr(csn(c2), cpr(c0, c2))), wcel(cv(hs0), cpr(cpr(c1, c2), ctp(c0, c1, c2))), wo(wceq(cv(hs0), csn(c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), cpr(c0, c2))), wo(wceq(cv(hs0), cpr(c1, c2)), wceq(cv(hs0), ctp(c0, c1, c2))))
  elpr(cv(hs0), csn(c2), cpr(c0, c2))
  elpr(cv(hs0), cpr(c1, c2), ctp(c0, c1, c2))
  vex(hs0)
  elun(cv(hs0), cun(cpr(emptycls, csn(c0)), cpr(csn(c1), cpr(c0, c1))), cun(cpr(csn(c2), cpr(c0, c2)), cpr(cpr(c1, c2), ctp(c0, c1, c2))))
  sstp(cv(hs0), c0, c1, c2)
  diff.hs0.c(cpw(ctp(c0, c1, c2)))
  diff.hs0.c(cun(cun(cpr(emptycls, csn(c0)), cpr(csn(c1), cpr(c0, c1))), cun(cpr(csn(c2), cpr(c0, c2)), cpr(cpr(c1, c2), ctp(c0, c1, c2)))))
  diff.hs0.c(ctp(c0, c1, c2))
}

blocks.name: pwpwpw0
blocks.content: Compute the power set of the power set of the power set of the empty set. (See also ~ pw0 and ~ pwpw0 .) (Contributed by NM, 2-May-2009.)

blocks.name: pwv
blocks.content: The power class of the universe is the universe. Exercise 4.12(d) of [Mendelson] p. 235. (Contributed by NM, 14-Sep-2003.)

blocks.name: prproe
blocks.content: For an element of a proper unordered pair of elements of a class ` V ` , there is another (different) element of the class ` V ` which is an element of the proper pair. (Contributed by AV, 18-Dec-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm prproe(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, cpr(c1, c2)), wne(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c1, c3), wcel(c2, c3))), wrex(s0, cdif(c3, csn(c0)), wcel(cv(s0), cpr(c1, c2))))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
} = {
  3impib(wcel(c0, cpr(c1, c2)), wne(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c1, c3), wcel(c2, c3)), wrex(s0, cdif(c3, csn(c0)), wcel(cv(s0), cpr(c1, c2))))
  syl(wcel(c0, cpr(c1, c2)), wi(wa(wne(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c1, c3), wcel(c2, c3))), wrex(s0, cdif(c3, csn(c0)), wcel(cv(s0), cpr(c1, c2)))), wo(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c0, c2)))
  elpri(c0, c1, c2)
  jaoi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c0, c2), wi(wa(wne(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c1, c3), wcel(c2, c3))), wrex(s0, cdif(c3, csn(c0)), wcel(cv(s0), cpr(c1, c2)))))
  ex(wceq(c0, c1), wa(wne(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c1, c3), wcel(c2, c3))), wrex(s0, cdif(c3, csn(c0)), wcel(cv(s0), cpr(c1, c2))))
  rspcedvd(s0, cdif(c3, csn(c0)), c2, wa(wceq(c0, c1), wa(wne(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c1, c3), wcel(c2, c3)))), wcel(cv(s0), cpr(c1, c2)), wcel(c2, cpr(c1, c2)))
  sylanbrc(wa(wceq(c0, c1), wa(wne(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c1, c3), wcel(c2, c3)))), wcel(c2, cdif(c3, csn(c0))), wcel(c2, c3), wne(c2, c0))
  simprrr(wceq(c0, c1), wne(c1, c2), wcel(c1, c3), wcel(c2, c3))
  impcom(wceq(c0, c1), wa(wne(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c1, c3), wcel(c2, c3))), wne(c2, c0))
  adantr(wne(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c1, c3), wcel(c2, c3)), wi(wceq(c0, c1), wne(c2, c0)))
  sylbi(wne(c1, c2), wi(wceq(c0, c1), wne(c2, c0)), wne(c2, c1))
  necom(c1, c2)
  biimpcd(wne(c2, c1), wceq(c0, c1), wne(c2, c0))
  eqcoms(c0, c1, wb(wne(c2, c1), wne(c2, c0)))
  neeq2(c1, c0, c2)
  eldifsn(c2, c3, c0)
  adantl(wa(wceq(c0, c1), wa(wne(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c1, c3), wcel(c2, c3)))), wceq(cv(s0), c2), wb(wcel(cv(s0), cpr(c1, c2)), wcel(c2, cpr(c1, c2))))
  eleq1(cv(s0), c2, cpr(c1, c2))
  adantl(wceq(c0, c1), wa(wne(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c1, c3), wcel(c2, c3))), wcel(c2, cpr(c1, c2)))
  adantl(wne(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c1, c3), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(c2, cpr(c1, c2)))
  adantl(wcel(c1, c3), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c2, cpr(c1, c2)))
  prid2g(c2, c3, c1)
  ex(wceq(c0, c2), wa(wne(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c1, c3), wcel(c2, c3))), wrex(s0, cdif(c3, csn(c0)), wcel(cv(s0), cpr(c1, c2))))
  rspcedvd(s0, cdif(c3, csn(c0)), c1, wa(wceq(c0, c2), wa(wne(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c1, c3), wcel(c2, c3)))), wcel(cv(s0), cpr(c1, c2)), wcel(c1, cpr(c1, c2)))
  sylanbrc(wa(wceq(c0, c2), wa(wne(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c1, c3), wcel(c2, c3)))), wcel(c1, cdif(c3, csn(c0))), wcel(c1, c3), wne(c1, c0))
  simprrl(wceq(c0, c2), wne(c1, c2), wcel(c1, c3), wcel(c2, c3))
  impcom(wceq(c0, c2), wa(wne(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c1, c3), wcel(c2, c3))), wne(c1, c0))
  adantr(wne(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c1, c3), wcel(c2, c3)), wi(wceq(c0, c2), wne(c1, c0)))
  biimpcd(wne(c1, c2), wceq(c0, c2), wne(c1, c0))
  eqcoms(c0, c2, wb(wne(c1, c2), wne(c1, c0)))
  neeq2(c2, c0, c1)
  eldifsn(c1, c3, c0)
  adantl(wa(wceq(c0, c2), wa(wne(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c1, c3), wcel(c2, c3)))), wceq(cv(s0), c1), wb(wcel(cv(s0), cpr(c1, c2)), wcel(c1, cpr(c1, c2))))
  eleq1(cv(s0), c1, cpr(c1, c2))
  adantl(wceq(c0, c2), wa(wne(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c1, c3), wcel(c2, c3))), wcel(c1, cpr(c1, c2)))
  adantl(wne(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c1, c3), wcel(c2, c3)), wcel(c1, cpr(c1, c2)))
  adantr(wcel(c1, c3), wcel(c2, c3), wcel(c1, cpr(c1, c2)))
  prid1g(c1, c3, c2)
  diff.cdif.s(s0, c3, csn(c0))
  diff.csn.s(s0, c0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wceq(c0, c1), wa(wne(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c1, c3), wcel(c2, c3))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, cpr(c1, c2))
  diff.wa.s(s0, wceq(c0, c2), wa(wne(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c1, c3), wcel(c2, c3))))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c0, c2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wne(c1, c2), wa(wcel(c1, c3), wcel(c2, c3)))
  diff.wne.s(s0, c1, c2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, wcel(c1, c3), wcel(c2, c3))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, c3)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, c3)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, cpr(c1, c2))
  diff.cpr.s(s0, c1, c2)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm prproe(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ { c1, c2 } ∧ c1 ≠ c2 ∧(c1 ∈ c3 ∧ c2 ∈ c3))→ ∃(s0 ∈(c3 \ { c0 }), s0 ∈ { c1, c2 }))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
} = {
  3impib(c0 ∈ { c1, c2 }, c1 ≠ c2, (c1 ∈ c3 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), ∃(s0 ∈(c3 \ { c0 }), s0 ∈ { c1, c2 }))
  syl(c0 ∈ { c1, c2 }, ((c1 ≠ c2 ∧(c1 ∈ c3 ∧ c2 ∈ c3))→ ∃(s0 ∈(c3 \ { c0 }), s0 ∈ { c1, c2 })), (c0 = c1 ∨ c0 = c2))
  elpri(c0, c1, c2)
  jaoi(c0 = c1, c0 = c2, ((c1 ≠ c2 ∧(c1 ∈ c3 ∧ c2 ∈ c3))→ ∃(s0 ∈(c3 \ { c0 }), s0 ∈ { c1, c2 })))
  ex(c0 = c1, (c1 ≠ c2 ∧(c1 ∈ c3 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)), ∃(s0 ∈(c3 \ { c0 }), s0 ∈ { c1, c2 }))
  rspcedvd(s0, (c3 \ { c0 }), c2, (c0 = c1 ∧(c1 ≠ c2 ∧(c1 ∈ c3 ∧ c2 ∈ c3))), s0 ∈ { c1, c2 }, c2 ∈ { c1, c2 })
  sylanbrc((c0 = c1 ∧(c1 ≠ c2 ∧(c1 ∈ c3 ∧ c2 ∈ c3))), c2 ∈(c3 \ { c0 }), c2 ∈ c3, c2 ≠ c0)
  simprrr(c0 = c1, c1 ≠ c2, c1 ∈ c3, c2 ∈ c3)
  impcom(c0 = c1, (c1 ≠ c2 ∧(c1 ∈ c3 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)), c2 ≠ c0)
  adantr(c1 ≠ c2, (c1 ∈ c3 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), (c0 = c1 → c2 ≠ c0))
  sylbi(c1 ≠ c2, (c0 = c1 → c2 ≠ c0), c2 ≠ c1)
  necom(c1, c2)
  biimpcd(c2 ≠ c1, c0 = c1, c2 ≠ c0)
  eqcoms(c0, c1, (c2 ≠ c1 ↔ c2 ≠ c0))
  neeq2(c1, c0, c2)
  eldifsn(c2, c3, c0)
  adantl((c0 = c1 ∧(c1 ≠ c2 ∧(c1 ∈ c3 ∧ c2 ∈ c3))), s0 = c2, (s0 ∈ { c1, c2 } ↔ c2 ∈ { c1, c2 }))
  eleq1(s0, c2, { c1, c2 })
  adantl(c0 = c1, (c1 ≠ c2 ∧(c1 ∈ c3 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)), c2 ∈ { c1, c2 })
  adantl(c1 ≠ c2, (c1 ∈ c3 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), c2 ∈ { c1, c2 })
  adantl(c1 ∈ c3, c2 ∈ c3, c2 ∈ { c1, c2 })
  prid2g(c2, c3, c1)
  ex(c0 = c2, (c1 ≠ c2 ∧(c1 ∈ c3 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)), ∃(s0 ∈(c3 \ { c0 }), s0 ∈ { c1, c2 }))
  rspcedvd(s0, (c3 \ { c0 }), c1, (c0 = c2 ∧(c1 ≠ c2 ∧(c1 ∈ c3 ∧ c2 ∈ c3))), s0 ∈ { c1, c2 }, c1 ∈ { c1, c2 })
  sylanbrc((c0 = c2 ∧(c1 ≠ c2 ∧(c1 ∈ c3 ∧ c2 ∈ c3))), c1 ∈(c3 \ { c0 }), c1 ∈ c3, c1 ≠ c0)
  simprrl(c0 = c2, c1 ≠ c2, c1 ∈ c3, c2 ∈ c3)
  impcom(c0 = c2, (c1 ≠ c2 ∧(c1 ∈ c3 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)), c1 ≠ c0)
  adantr(c1 ≠ c2, (c1 ∈ c3 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), (c0 = c2 → c1 ≠ c0))
  biimpcd(c1 ≠ c2, c0 = c2, c1 ≠ c0)
  eqcoms(c0, c2, (c1 ≠ c2 ↔ c1 ≠ c0))
  neeq2(c2, c0, c1)
  eldifsn(c1, c3, c0)
  adantl((c0 = c2 ∧(c1 ≠ c2 ∧(c1 ∈ c3 ∧ c2 ∈ c3))), s0 = c1, (s0 ∈ { c1, c2 } ↔ c1 ∈ { c1, c2 }))
  eleq1(s0, c1, { c1, c2 })
  adantl(c0 = c2, (c1 ≠ c2 ∧(c1 ∈ c3 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)), c1 ∈ { c1, c2 })
  adantl(c1 ≠ c2, (c1 ∈ c3 ∧ c2 ∈ c3), c1 ∈ { c1, c2 })
  adantr(c1 ∈ c3, c2 ∈ c3, c1 ∈ { c1, c2 })
  prid1g(c1, c3, c2)
  diff.cdif.s(s0, c3, { c0 })
  diff.csn.s(s0, c0)
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 = c1, (c1 ≠ c2 ∧(c1 ∈ c3 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, { c1, c2 })
  diff.wa.s(s0, c0 = c2, (c1 ≠ c2 ∧(c1 ∈ c3 ∧ c2 ∈ c3)))
  diff.wceq.s(s0, c0, c2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, c1 ≠ c2, (c1 ∈ c3 ∧ c2 ∈ c3))
  diff.wne.s(s0, c1, c2)
  diff.wa.s(s0, c1 ∈ c3, c2 ∈ c3)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, c3)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c2, c3)
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c1, { c1, c2 })
  diff.cpr.s(s0, c1, c2)
}

blocks.name: 3elpr2eq
blocks.content: If there are three elements in a proper unordered pair, and two of them are different from the third one, the two must be equal. (Contributed by AV, 19-Dec-2021.)
blocks.origin:
thm 3elpr2eq(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(w3a(wcel(c0, cpr(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, cpr(c1, c2)), wcel(c4, cpr(c1, c2))), wa(wne(c3, c0), wne(c4, c0))), wceq(c3, c4))
} = {
  imp(w3a(wcel(c0, cpr(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, cpr(c1, c2)), wcel(c4, cpr(c1, c2))), wa(wne(c3, c0), wne(c4, c0)), wceq(c3, c4))
  syl3an(wcel(c0, cpr(c1, c2)), wcel(c3, cpr(c1, c2)), wcel(c4, cpr(c1, c2)), wi(wa(wne(c3, c0), wne(c4, c0)), wceq(c3, c4)), wo(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c0, c2)), wo(wceq(c3, c1), wceq(c3, c2)), wo(wceq(c4, c1), wceq(c4, c2)))
  elpri(c0, c1, c2)
  elpri(c3, c1, c2)
  elpri(c4, c1, c2)
  3imp(wo(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c0, c2)), wo(wceq(c3, c1), wceq(c3, c2)), wo(wceq(c4, c1), wceq(c4, c2)), wi(wa(wne(c3, c0), wne(c4, c0)), wceq(c3, c4)))
  jaoi(wceq(c0, c1), wceq(c0, c2), wi(wo(wceq(c3, c1), wceq(c3, c2)), wi(wo(wceq(c4, c1), wceq(c4, c2)), wi(wa(wne(c3, c0), wne(c4, c0)), wceq(c3, c4)))))
  com13(wceq(c0, c1), wo(wceq(c3, c1), wceq(c3, c2)), wo(wceq(c4, c1), wceq(c4, c2)), wi(wa(wne(c3, c0), wne(c4, c0)), wceq(c3, c4)))
  jaoi(wceq(c4, c1), wceq(c4, c2), wi(wo(wceq(c3, c1), wceq(c3, c2)), wi(wceq(c0, c1), wi(wa(wne(c3, c0), wne(c4, c0)), wceq(c3, c4)))))
  a1d(wceq(c4, c1), wo(wceq(c3, c1), wceq(c3, c2)), wi(wceq(c0, c1), wi(wa(wne(c3, c0), wne(c4, c0)), wceq(c3, c4))))
  ex(wceq(c4, c1), wceq(c0, c1), wi(wa(wne(c3, c0), wne(c4, c0)), wceq(c3, c4)))
  adantld(wa(wceq(c4, c1), wceq(c0, c1)), wne(c3, c0), wne(c4, c0), wceq(c3, c4))
  syl(wa(wceq(c4, c1), wceq(c0, c1)), wi(wne(c4, c0), wceq(c3, c4)), wceq(c4, c0))
  eqtr3(c4, c1, c0)
  com12(wceq(c4, c2), wo(wceq(c3, c1), wceq(c3, c2)), wi(wceq(c0, c1), wi(wa(wne(c3, c0), wne(c4, c0)), wceq(c3, c4))))
  jaoi(wceq(c3, c1), wceq(c3, c2), wi(wceq(c4, c2), wi(wceq(c0, c1), wi(wa(wne(c3, c0), wne(c4, c0)), wceq(c3, c4)))))
  a1d(wceq(c3, c1), wceq(c4, c2), wi(wceq(c0, c1), wi(wa(wne(c3, c0), wne(c4, c0)), wceq(c3, c4))))
  ex(wceq(c3, c1), wceq(c0, c1), wi(wa(wne(c3, c0), wne(c4, c0)), wceq(c3, c4)))
  impd(wa(wceq(c3, c1), wceq(c0, c1)), wne(c3, c0), wne(c4, c0), wceq(c3, c4))
  syl(wa(wceq(c3, c1), wceq(c0, c1)), wi(wne(c3, c0), wi(wne(c4, c0), wceq(c3, c4))), wceq(c3, c0))
  eqtr3(c3, c1, c0)
  ex(wceq(c3, c2), wceq(c4, c2), wi(wceq(c0, c1), wi(wa(wne(c3, c0), wne(c4, c0)), wceq(c3, c4))))
  2a1d(wa(wceq(c3, c2), wceq(c4, c2)), wceq(c0, c1), wa(wne(c3, c0), wne(c4, c0)), wceq(c3, c4))
  eqtr3(c3, c2, c4)
  com13(wceq(c0, c2), wo(wceq(c3, c1), wceq(c3, c2)), wo(wceq(c4, c1), wceq(c4, c2)), wi(wa(wne(c3, c0), wne(c4, c0)), wceq(c3, c4)))
  jaoi(wceq(c4, c1), wceq(c4, c2), wi(wo(wceq(c3, c1), wceq(c3, c2)), wi(wceq(c0, c2), wi(wa(wne(c3, c0), wne(c4, c0)), wceq(c3, c4)))))
  com12(wceq(c4, c1), wo(wceq(c3, c1), wceq(c3, c2)), wi(wceq(c0, c2), wi(wa(wne(c3, c0), wne(c4, c0)), wceq(c3, c4))))
  jaoi(wceq(c3, c1), wceq(c3, c2), wi(wceq(c4, c1), wi(wceq(c0, c2), wi(wa(wne(c3, c0), wne(c4, c0)), wceq(c3, c4)))))
  ex(wceq(c3, c1), wceq(c4, c1), wi(wceq(c0, c2), wi(wa(wne(c3, c0), wne(c4, c0)), wceq(c3, c4))))
  2a1d(wa(wceq(c3, c1), wceq(c4, c1)), wceq(c0, c2), wa(wne(c3, c0), wne(c4, c0)), wceq(c3, c4))
  eqtr3(c3, c1, c4)
  a1d(wceq(c3, c2), wceq(c4, c1), wi(wceq(c0, c2), wi(wa(wne(c3, c0), wne(c4, c0)), wceq(c3, c4))))
  ex(wceq(c3, c2), wceq(c0, c2), wi(wa(wne(c3, c0), wne(c4, c0)), wceq(c3, c4)))
  impd(wa(wceq(c3, c2), wceq(c0, c2)), wne(c3, c0), wne(c4, c0), wceq(c3, c4))
  syl(wa(wceq(c3, c2), wceq(c0, c2)), wi(wne(c3, c0), wi(wne(c4, c0), wceq(c3, c4))), wceq(c3, c0))
  eqtr3(c3, c2, c0)
  eqneqall(c3, c0, wi(wne(c4, c0), wceq(c3, c4)))
  a1d(wceq(c4, c2), wo(wceq(c3, c1), wceq(c3, c2)), wi(wceq(c0, c2), wi(wa(wne(c3, c0), wne(c4, c0)), wceq(c3, c4))))
  ex(wceq(c4, c2), wceq(c0, c2), wi(wa(wne(c3, c0), wne(c4, c0)), wceq(c3, c4)))
  adantld(wa(wceq(c4, c2), wceq(c0, c2)), wne(c3, c0), wne(c4, c0), wceq(c3, c4))
  syl(wa(wceq(c4, c2), wceq(c0, c2)), wi(wne(c4, c0), wceq(c3, c4)), wceq(c4, c0))
  eqtr3(c4, c2, c0)
  eqneqall(c4, c0, wceq(c3, c4))
}
